recentChanges: More performance and bug fixes.
comments: unfortunately this app is not functional anymore. You can't search for anything, if you tap on search, another window is opening(!) nothing happens. I'll just use the website. pity. Still. After googling something and there is a prompt to open the app it just can't open. After about 3 years, 2 devices, the app is just broken. I am always updated.

As of very recently, the app no longer functions correctly. I cannot press "apply" when changing filters for job searches, this issue persisted after clearing cache and data. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, and at the login section, when pressing Skip, I am unable to press any of the buttons on the next pop-up confirming that I want to skip login.

Doesn't save my searches or save any jobs. Always freezing or crashing. I can't even upload my resume. I've tried updating from my phone, google drive, and dropbox. For some reason it keeps saying the upload failed and it is not because of the size or format. Every time I attempt to put in the information by typing I just get a blank screen and it freezes up. I can't even see what information/email I used to sign up with so that I can just try and do it on my laptop

The search function does not work right. I would like to search for jobs across the country and the location setting is "(optional)"; however, it will not conduct a search unless you put in a location. It becomes very tedious to have to search city by city. This should be corrected. Also, the instructions for closing an account lead to a bunch of dead ends. There are no close account options under the profile settings as noted in the help section.

It has been somewhat easy to use but definitely still needs improvements such as allowing me to file jobs that I have applied for into its own category so that when I get a response from employers, I can go find the relevant job description for reference (the existing "Applied Jobs" tab is useless). Jobs by proximity doesn't seem to do much help.

title: Free Conference Call
description:
The FreeConferenceCall.com Android app provides quick and easy access to the best collaboration tools within seconds. Host or join a meeting, share content or chat with meeting participants anywhere, anytime. 

· Free HD audio conferencing for up to 1,000 participants 
· Online meetings with screen sharing and video conferencing
· Chat with meeting participants
· Zoom in or out on screen sharing content

Joining a Meeting:
To get started, download the Android app to your device. At the scheduled time of the online meeting, tap the invitation link from your email or tap the FreeConferenceCall.com icon and enter the meeting credentials.

Connecting to the Audio Conference Call:
Once you have joined the meeting, you have the option to dial in to the conference call using your internet connection (select the phone icon from the App menu bar) or a regular telephone.
Please contact Customer Care at (877) 553-1680 or by email at support@freeconferencecall.com for any questions or comments.

About FreeConferenceCall.com
FreeConferenceCall.com is a service that is redefining the traditional approach to conferencing with high-quality, reliable mission-critical technology at disruptive prices. FreeConferenceCall.com is an easy-to-use collaboration tool that provides the freedom and flexibility to hold online meetings with HD audio, video conferencing and screen sharing.

recentChanges: Bug fixes & stability improvements
comments: The update has many improvements but one major drawback. I love that you can switch between separate screens for hosting and joining conferences but there's an issue. When you host a meeting, unless you sign out, in every meeting that you "join" (rather than host) after, you appear by the name of the meeting that you most recently hosted. On the other hand, if you do log out entirely, unless I'm missing something, you lose the list of the previously joined meetings.

For the fact that it free without ad, wonderful, I've just discovered it for church meeting during this Coronavirus that it wasn't possible to meet at church hall in Italy. It helped us meet even as far as we are from each other. May the Lord God bless and promote your organisation as you render platform to share the word of God and prayers.

Ive been using this conference line consistently for over 3 years. Most times 1 time a week and every quarter 21 days in row. No matter the conference line is always available. Members get on with ease. Very little issues and for the most part it is flawless. The new app upgrade is also sleek. Its better to use app because some phone carriers charge 1 cent per minute for calls. Other than that minor issue I am grateful for the line.

Equal to or better than Zoom, Go to Meeting, or any other platform I've used over the past 20 years. Fantastically blessed through this phenomenal, free, world class quality platform. I was introduced to it through my church when our pastor initiated a daily prayer line meeting for our congregation. That was 10-15 years ago and it is still going strong. My next opportunity came as a teacher. We use this regularly to collaborate throughout our school district, region, and state.

I may change my rating to 5 stars after video conferencing with it for the first time :) FCC is really a blessing because many people and smaller groups don't have the resources to pay for quality conferencing services. The reports and follow up messages were a pleasant surprise. The download took 2 minutes; all other apps that I have used, whether for entertainment or communication, took 1-2 HOURS. I will make my donation this week and encourage my friends to do the same. God bless you, FCC!

title: Square Point of Sale - POS
description:
Square Point of Sale is the free mobile point of sale app for Android that helps you accept payments and run your business.

Accept debit and credit card payments with the Square Reader for magstripe, and access your funds in only 1 - 2 business days. Use the Square Reader for contactless and chip to accept EMV chip cards and Android Pay.  Need your funds faster? Access them instantly with the new Square card - order it directly from the POS app! 

Square’s POS app also keeps track of your sales and inventory in real time, and provides powerful reports about your business. 

There are no long-term contracts, no commitments, and no hidden fees.

Sign in from anywhere to your Square Dashboard to view live sales data from your Android POS app. Analyze trends and use other free tools to help you improve your business.

FEATURES 
- Credit cards: accept Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express payments with the free reader you can request when you sign up. Pay only 2.6% +10¢ per tap, dip, or swipe. No hidden fees.
- Customers pay, tip, and sign right on the payment app
- Record cash, gift cards, and other forms of tender
- Send and track invoices directly from the payment app 
- Send receipts via email or text message directly from the payment app 
- Apply discounts and issue refunds directly from your POS
- Access real-time payment data and complete sales history
- Track inventory in real time and get alerts when you’re running low
- Connect receipt printers, kitchen ticket printers, barcode scanners, cash drawers

recentChanges:
We update our apps regularly to make sure they’re at 100%. This update includes minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for selling with Square. Questions? We’re here to help: square.com/help.
comments: I have the service and even though it seems to work for other people, I have inventory of items I sell @ physical locations and and online presence which is still under development. I have set the two locations and square is syncing with the website with no problems. We work weekends only at our mobile physical location and every week I have to call technical support in order to address inventory irregularities. Either there is stock missing or items are added to my present stock. It throws inventory out of whack and I have to spend hours reconciling inventory. I have made my case with Square technical support, this is now my third time, with no resolution to the issue. The technical support team that addresses the issues at level one are very well trained and very professional, however they have issues on the backend with a business such as mine. I am just getting started and don't know if this is going to work for my business, I am reluctant. I have less than 100 products and I cannot imagine as I scale my business what nightmares I will go through with the inventory issue that seems illusive the developers. I am looking for something more stable for my business. Unless they get a handle on this issue I will be looking elsewhere. I will give them the benefit of the doubt

The square chip reader has not functioned well for a few months now. Too frequent updates leave it unusable. Have to restart app regularly to get them to connect. 70% of the time it still doesn't work. Really becomes a problem when the card will not work with swipe bc it must be read by chip reader... But chip reader still won't connect, or freezes during processing. Aside from that, pretty good.

Bought a old tablet specifically mentioned under supported devices and guess what, is not supported. Update to latest firmware and all. $40 down the drain. I had to buy it because I made the mistake of updating the app and of course it stopped working on an old iPad I had. Thanks square, you're the best!

Your description of this app is misleading and just plain false advertisement. No hidden fees? How about the the card reader that is supposed to be free, you dont even mention it in your description. I will contact you by phone as well because every response I see here is generic and not helpful at all. I have missed probably over $1,000 in income waiting for a reader that is supposedly on your site even though when you make your account it says we will send your reader asap. You lose too

It works fine but does not at all sync with Etsy. I would have been better off adding adding items in manually & then syncing though Etsy as it makes me have to redo everything every single time, it's so annoying. I don't want to have to re-enter the stock that I have entered and what category it goes in every single time I sync, it's a huge waste of time. Other than that the app seems ok, that just bothers me enough to where if I knew that was going to happen I would have tried something else.

title: BlueJeans Video Conferencing
description:
BlueJeans makes business-quality video conferencing easy, accessible and affordable. The BlueJeans app works with the BlueJeans service to provide truly universal, multi-party video calls. With the BlueJeans app, users can host or join video conferences from anywhere. BlueJeans helps businesses of all sizes have collaborative, productive and engaging meetings without the hassle or expense of dedicated hardware. 

Features
Host or join a video meeting with up to 25 participants (up to 100 as a premium service)
Arrange the layout of conference participants to suit your preferences  
Wi-Fi and 4G/LTE optimised 

PLEASE NOTE
To host meetings via the BlueJeans app, one must have an existing BlueJeans account.  However, you do not need an account to attend a meeting. For more information, please go to bluejeans.com.

BlueJeans makes business-quality video conferencing easy, accessible and affordable. The BlueJeans app works with the BlueJeans service to provide truly universal, multi-party video calls. PLEASE NOTE

summary: BlueJeans makes video conferences as easy and pervasive as audio conferences.
recentChanges:
Improved audio quality in low bandwidth conditions
Miscellaneous bug fixes
comments: Just used it for the first time with about 8 friends who were all using it via apple devices or PC. I was the only one who couldn't see the others. Ridiculous failing of the one thing the app was supposed to do. Yet another example of oblivious developers ignoring Android users for who knows what reasons. It's mind boggling.

After the update it doesn't recognize my headphones, the call dial sound goes to my headphones but as soon as I enter a call it uses only speakers and only speakers is available in the audio devices, can't join calls in public with my phone anymore which defeats the whole purpose. It happens on Samsung S8 +. This needs to be fixed. Edit... the new update seems to fixed the issue.
Quick and easy. Video and audio quality is good. App is heavy and keeps logging out (even desktop app). Echo problems are consistent across the web and mobile. Overall I found Zoom much better
The Audio and Video quality and clarity was the best o have experienced so far compared to other platforms. I just completed a 90min conf call with high quality communication
Very efficient way to connect with team or client, 100% real time video conferencing with zero delay, buffer or any issues

title: USPS MOBILE®
description:
Access popular USPS.com® tools on the go with the “USPS Mobile®” app: calculate shipping prices (limitations apply), find a Post Office ™, look up a ZIP Code™, schedule a next-day pickup, request USPS to hold your mail, access Informed Delivery® to track packages and digitally preview incoming mail, and more.

•	Check the status of shipments sent using Priority Mail®, Priority Mail Express®, Certified Mail®, and certain other delivery services.  Nickname your shipments and sign up for text and email alerts to notify you of the delivery status.
 
•	Calculate a Domestic or International Price to determine how much postage you will need when you ship a letter, card, large envelope, or package (limitations apply). Choose retail or online pricing, add any extra services you need, and view the total, too.

•	Find USPS® Locations when you need to get to a Post Office™, Self-Service Kiosk (APC®) or collection box with an easy-to-filter locator. The USPS Mobile app uses your device’s GPS to show your closest options on a map, along with their Regular Hours, Special Hours and Last Collection Times, and provides mapped results with driving, walking, or transit directions. 

•	Look up a ZIP Code™ for any U.S. or Canadian address.

•	Schedule a free next-day pickup and have your Letter Carrier pick up Priority Mail®, Priority Mail Express®, Global Express Guaranteed®, or Merchandise Return Services shipments from your home or office during regular mail delivery. 

•	Request Hold Mail Service while you’re away, and we’ll keep your mail at your local Post Office™ for you to pick up or be delivered by your carrier when you return.

•	Scan the barcode on shipping labels with your device’s camera.  The app recognizes the shipment and stores the label number, so you can stay on top of delivery status.

•	Link to Informed Delivery to track packages and digitally preview your household’s incoming mail arriving soon; view grayscale images of the exterior, address side of letter-sized mailpieces.

recentChanges: Maintenance and bug fixes
comments: This app is wonderful! Very easy to use, I can track packages that I've ordered, and they make it super-easy to calculate how much something will cost to ship with their awesome shipping calculator. They even give you the option to receive updates via text message whenever your order/package is scanned when going from one post office to another. This app has definitely made my life a little bit easier! I highly recommend it! Thanks 🙂

This WAS a great and useful app until it was updated. I usually had my mail held nearly every month, but I've only successfully had it held one time in the last few months. It's not the post office or carrier...it's the app. I can enter a start date to hold my mail, but when I try to enter an end date (3 or more days' hold), it changes the start date to the date I want it to end. For the "Hold Mail" feature, this app is now TOTALLY USELESS.

So easy to use. I tell everyone about it. Update.. Feb 11, 2024.. Still great for seeing what mail/packages r coming. The one thing that's frustrating is even though I select to stay signed in, Iit doesn't n i have hard time remembering username n password..ugh.. Update-3/19/20 can't remem passwords or username n still won't stay logged in

Knowing that you have mail or packages in advance is a plus. So if a piece is not delivered USPS can check on it. I would not have know this without this service. It also helps when you sharecan apartment, which has happen they had a piece of my mail by mistake because they did not check well their mail. Thanks for this service.

I was having problems with my mail after i purchased a P.O. Box it well over a month to get my mail straightened out, to make a long story short I downloaded the USPS mobile app. I love it!! I will receive alerts from the post office when I have mail or a package in my P.O. Box and it will show what it is!! Love this app.

title: Genius Scan - PDF Scanner
description:
Quickly scan your paper documents on the go and export them as multi-page PDF files.

*** 20+ million users *** 1000s of small businesses ***

Place any document in front of your device’s camera: our scanner app automatically recognizes the paper against the background, crops it, and cleans up the result. You obtain a crisp, legible scan. Batch scanning lets you scan dozens of pages in a matter of seconds. Powerful tools help you organize, share, or archive your documents.

== KEY FEATURES == 

Smart Scanning:

- Document detection & background removal
- Distortion correction
- Shadow removal and defect cleanup
- Filters (black & white, whiteboard, photo)
- Batch scanning

PDF Creation & Editing:

- Document merging & splitting
- Multiple page PDF creation
- Photos and PDF import

Security & Privacy:

- On-device document processing
+ Fingerprint locking
+ PDF password encryption

Document Organization:

- Document tagging
- Metadata and content search
+ Custom naming schemes (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup and multi-device sync with Genius Cloud (separate subscription)

Export:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, OneDrive, FTP, WebDAV.
+ Any WebDAV compatible service such as Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. 
+ Automatic background auto-export

OCR (Text Recognition):

+ Text extraction
+ Searchable PDF creation
+ Business card scanning & contact creation

The features denoted with [+] are available as part of Genius Scan+ (a one-time purchase).

== ABOUT US ==

It’s in the heart of Paris, France that The Grizzly Labs develops Genius Scan. We take pride in crafting apps that help millions of users throughout the world and hold ourselves to the highest standards in terms of quality and privacy. Get in touch with us @thegrizzlylabs if you have any questions.

summary: Genius Scan is a scanner app in your pocket.
recentChanges:
This update of Genius Scan brings a feature requested by many users: Text recognition (aka OCR).
It makes it possible to search documents by their content and produce searchable and selectable PDF documents.
It's only available for Genius Scan+ and Genius Cloud users.

We've also improved help pages, fixed a distortion issue and a problme when restoring backup files.
comments: This app definitely gets the job done. May not be all flashy but it does exactly what I need it to do. I have yet to run into any issues. The most frustrating thing about it is probably having trouble capturing the image. Most of the time it's no problem, but every now and then it will take forever to get a quality scan. Overall, 4 stars. Worth it.

This is a MUST HAVE app for both personal and for business that everyone should have. I LOVE IT. As a Realtor I no longer need to run back to the office to scan docs in order to send them to my clients. I am able to scan immediately where ever we are signing and clients really like and appreciate this type of service. This app has lots of great features. Thank you so much to the person or people that created this app that has made such a difference for my business.

Whew! I "think" my search is over. Lot's of free useful setup features and lots of one time, under 5 buck, purchases. So far, it's underrated! Try it, then buy the extra features. You can live without them, but why, when the total package is so affordable.

Amazing, useful, it is a game changer! I used this app for YEARS and I absolutely love it. Especially when you don't have an actual scanner. This app really makes your work look like a PDF document. BEST APP EVER! I recommended this app so MANY people, including family and they love it too! Honestly, it's even easier to use than an actual scanner and fax machine!

Excellent App. Turns paperwork into a pdf, gave me a choice of emails, drives, dropbox, and more. Makes going to Staples for scanning pdf's a chore of the past. Just takes a moment to pick up and auto center documents. I love it! Way to go! The perfect modern use of technology.

title: Grubhub for Drivers
description:
Become a Grubhub Driver and deliver customers the food they love from their favorite restaurants. With the largest restaurant and diner network, Grubhub offers more opportunities to make money on your own schedule. 

Why drive with Grubhub?

MAKE GREAT MONEY
Earn competitive money and keep 100% of your tips as a Grubhub delivery person.

WORK WHEN YOU WANT
Work part time, full time or in your spare time. You can schedule your hours in advance or have the flexibility to deliver on short notice. Create a schedule that works for you!

BE YOUR OWN BOSS
Grubhub for Drivers is built to help you earn — make deliveries, track your hours, see how much you’ve made and manage your schedule.

NO CAR NEEDED
Whether you’re a driver, biker or delivering on your moped, the Grubhub for Drivers app was built to help you succeed.

EASY SIGN UP
Download the Grubhub for Drivers app and sign up to work at driver.grubhub.com. We’ll walk you through each step along the way.

MORE ORDERS, MORE OPPORTUNITIES TO EARN
Grubhub has the largest restaurant and diner network of any other food delivery platform.

Grubhub drivers are earning money in cities across the US, including: Albany, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Bridgeport, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Hartford, Houston, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis, Nashville, New York City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Seattle, St. Louis, Sacramento, Tampa, Washington DC … and many more.

summary: Drive and earn extra money
recentChanges: • New functionality for healthy and safety precautions and contact-free deliveries.
comments: the support does not solve anything, you can call or send email. it's been over 2 months since i reported that i lost my card, my account was blocked saying that i need to activate a new card, i received an email on the 29th of January saying that i would receive a new card in 7-10 days. I have already contacted you more than 5 times, sending email and calling and no one can solve a simple problem.

It's pretty good, but cannot detect when you have arrived or are leaving the restaurant. "Delivered" button is easy to acvidentally tap when arriving at the diner's location or gathering everything to take to the door. Should be a swipe or second tap to confirm. It takes days to switch bank cards/accounts. Maps should be better integrated. It doesn't calculate distances or ETAs to the pick up and drop off to help the driver judge if he can make the pickup or delivery on time.

5 months and no improvement! The app logs out constantly. Button to View offers doesnt always work, causing me to miss the order! They offer you orders right before a restaurant closes or you're too far away to get there before closing. Every "failed" acceptance or delivery affects your rating and ability to schedule shifts. It has been 2 months since I asked for a replacement Driver Card for orders and have contacted support several times with no response and I cannot accept orders without it!

A bit slow at times. App off and on tells me I'm offline when I am clearly not, once my block got cancelled and I was just waiting on notifications.... Not cool ###update###: OK this app constantly disconnects while I'm either waiting or delivering! I lost several blocks now because of this! I am not going to stare at this app while I'm waiting, I'm doing other stuff and I am always online, you need to fix this because it's a huge pain in the ass!

No longer working on Galaxy Note 8. I uninstalled and reinstalled 5+ times. Restarted my phone countless times. When I try to open the app, it shows a blank white screen for about 5-10 seconds, and then return to my phone's app screen. It closes itself out. It keeps doing this. BEFORE THIS, the app wouldn't constantly log itself out and vibrate continuously with the login screen continously sliding. Thank God I have the Samsung J7, works on that with WiFi/Hotspot. Or else I'd have no income.

title: Job Search by ZipRecruiter
description:
1. Install the ZipRecruiter Job Search app.
2. Tell us about the jobs you're looking for: location + keywords, or job titles
3. Find jobs you like!
4. Apply with just one tap!

ZipRecuiter is the employment app that gives you the best results because it searches for you automatically!

The Zip job board helps you find a good job nearby fast. It learns what kind of employment you're looking for, searches for you, and automatically notifies you when there's a new job that is a good match for you! Other job finder apps make looking for a job hard. Not ZipRecruiter!

If you want to find a good job this employment app will really help you, because it searches automatically across 100s of job boards. "No pain, no gain" has never been less true!

You'll receive notifications about local jobs that are a good match for you. YOU will be the first to know when local jobs become available!

If you're looking for: "find local jobs now hiring near me", "jobs around me", "hiring jobs now local"? Then this is indeed the jobsearch app for you.

With just one search, you can instantly find a real job among the millions of jobs available.

If you're looking for: "find local jobs now hiring near me", "jobs around me", "hiring jobs now local"? Then this is indeed the jobsearch app for you.

With just one search, you can instantly find a real job among the millions of jobs available.

The ZipRecruiter job search app also includes jobs from other employment apps.

And many more. So you don't need to search using other job applications, because ZipRecruiter includes those employment opportunities too.

You can find almost any kind of job in the Zip Jobs app.

developerAddress:
ZipRecruiter, Inc.
401 Wilshire Blvd., 11th Floor,
Santa Monica, CA 90401
USA
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
comments: I have used a wide range of websites and apps in my search over the last two months, and one-click was mostly aspirational... until I found ZipRecruiter. The app is ridiculously easy to use, provided you put the effort in to create a solid and accurate profile. One-click really is one-click on 75% of the roles, and the rest have no more than 1-5 filter questions before the application submits. The instant feedback gives you an immediate sense of how likely you are to get an initial screener.

A very helpful service with a user friendly interface. However as a Canadian, the inability to change the salary denomination to Canadian dollars and the distance calculator to kilometers, I can't give this app a perfect rating. For a service that's meant to be used in Canada, it's very clear that no thought was put into altering the experience for an international audience, which harms the usability of the service.

Great concept. Love the "1-Tap" option for filling applications. I can not rate this app 5 stars, as I've yet to land a job, on account that I haven't had appropriate interactions with this site to do so. Just know that I will give this app a 5 star rating, when I do land myself a good job!

I'm one of the last old school so it took me a minute to warm up to it but 1 touch application and knowing instantly when a job is posted. 1 piece of advice if possible once you apply to introduce yourself to them so that got a face to go with the app. Day 2: my notifications have been blowing my phone up all day job offers left and right it's crazy. It's a good feeling when you Have a choice in jobs instead of settling one the first 1 THANKS FOR THE HELP

Needs locations listed more clearly. The jump of 10 miles to 25 miles is actually quite a gap where I am. 30 minutes away vs an hour and a half. Wish they had 15 mile difference. I keep nixing stuff for their locations being too far, and yet that's like the only suggestion they ever make is that location that I always say no to

title: Workday
description:
The Workday app provides secure, mobile access to your Workday applications on-the-go.

Our simple interface lets you

• Quickly conduct administrative tasks – view or request time off, capture expenses, clock in and clock out to enter time worked, or review your payslip – without disrupting your day.
• View your notifications and tasks that require your attention and immediately take action.
Easily browse the company directory, securely view worker profiles, and leave feedback while it’s still top of mind.
• View your team or individual profiles and immediately take actions relevant to your role, such as perform a job change, make a compensation change, or provide performance feedback.
• Stay connected to your business by gaining quick insight into what’s important through interactive reports and dashboards.

And if your mobile device is ever lost or stolen, you can be confident that your data is secure. With support for fingerprint scanning, only you can access your information.

Note: Your organization must authorize access to the Workday mobile app. Not all mobile features may be available to you. You’ll have access to mobile features your organization has enabled, based on your role. Not all Workday features are available on mobile.

summary: The Workday app provides mobile access to Workday's enterprise cloud application
comments: I don't know what issues everyone else is having, but mine has no issues. In fact, I came to review this simply because I love the new breakdown of pay details. It's very handy and informative! My only complaint is that I have to enter a one time password that they send through text every time I log in. Checking the "remember this device" doesn't make a difference. But it's 5 seconds of of my day, once a week. I'll survive.

This app NEVER remembers my email. It's so annoying that I have to enter it every single time I log in. Even if I check the box "remember me", it never does. Plus, EVERY SINGLE TIME I log in I check the box "don't verify my identity on this device again" and still send me a code by text all the time. I mean, seriously? Not practical at all. You guys need to fix it I'm sick of having to wait for a code and entering that code on the app everytime I log in!

"Work Day Does Not Work" The "remember me" function does not work. The "Do not challenge me" does not work Every time you want to log in you need to log in with email/pass, than wait, than go to a secondary screen for phone confirmation, request a text, wait for the text, put that in, and than log in. Every time. This is my experience both with home office and at work. System is very fiddly and has a lot of issues. Avoid if possible. New updates are useful, but dont adress any of tproblems.

Simply awful...I guess I'm not surprised. Workday on my pc is terrible and they've somehow managed to make the app worse. It's telling me it doesn't recognize my user name or password but doesn't provide any means or instructions to recover it. Everybody I speak to in my hr department tells me how much they hate the system when I call for assistance. If you're thinking of getting workday for your company do yourself a favor and don't.

So, I signed into my account on Workday and I'm not allowed to; swipe around to view the full web page, open any other outside pages, can't pinch the screen to make it fit my 6.7 inch display, not able to rotate the screen, as well as there is NO settings to change the displays. ONLY thing I'm able to do is scroll up and down. Quite horrible, very horrible.

title: Hangouts Chat
description:
Hangouts Chat is an intelligent and secure communications tool, built for teams. From direct messages to team chat rooms, Hangouts Chat provides an integrated platform that makes team communication easy and efficient. Current version is for G Suite customers only. 

 • Group messaging that allows G Suite content sharing (Docs, Sheets, Slides), without having to worry about granting permissions.
 • Google search functionality, with options to filter for conversations and content that you’ve shared.
 • Integration with G Suite & third-party tools will be available. Hangouts Meet Bot reviews everyone’s calendars and schedules meetings at times that work for everyone.
 • Ready for Enterprise, with the full benefits of G Suite security and access controls including Data Loss Prevention, Compliance, Admin Settings, Vault Retention, Holds, Search & Export.
descriptionHTML:
Hangouts Chat is an intelligent and secure communications tool, built for teams. From direct messages to team chat rooms, Hangouts Chat provides an integrated platform that makes team communication easy and efficient. Current version is for G Suite customers only.

• Group messaging that allows G Suite content sharing (Docs, Sheets, Slides), without having to worry about granting permissions.
• Google search functionality, with options to filter for conversations and content that you’ve shared.
• Integration with G Suite & third-party tools will be available. Hangouts Meet Bot reviews everyone’s calendars and schedules meetings at times that work for everyone.
• Ready for Enterprise, with the full benefits of G Suite security and access controls including Data Loss Prevention, Compliance, Admin Settings, Vault Retention, Holds, Search & Export.
summary: Intelligent team communication
recentChanges: Current version, for G Suite Customers only, includes direct messages, group chats, and platform integration with Google apps
comments: This has great potential but missing some important features. First, the windows desktop app should be minimized to the tray button when you press close (x). Now it just terminates. Second it is hard to drop files, sometimes it fails. Third, on all setups, if you have the application open on one setup e.g Android, and you receive a message and you read it, you get notified on the other setups e.g desktop app or browser if your have it open. On other chat apps you are notified once only.

This is potentially the worst chat application available today. Hangouts had more features, and it was barely usable. I seriously wish I wasn't required to use this... it's not even comparable to its "competition". Side note: Get your branding together, Google. What is this? Hangouts Chat? Chat? If you don't know, how do you expect us to??

Really bad app. A long list of black text over a white background..... seriously ? Is that the best design you can come up with ? Plus require gsuite invitation.... How do we chat with external people ? Seriously designed by people who never actually use it outside of a software engineering team.
On the web version: Google Chat is a painfully slow garbage with horrible and confusing search tools. Why would here be any different? Poor navigational interface usability, to say the least.

Its like they took Hangouts which is amazing and made the user interface suck. The user avatars are gone. Just a bunch of text over white. Groups are now considered rooms. Someone at Google saw Slack and though, that program is terrible, how can we emulate it?

title: RingCentral
description:
Work from anywhere with the leading all-in-one team messaging, video conferencing, and phone calling solution. You and your team can stay more connected, focused, and productive while staying home and keeping your social distances.

If you're an educator (K-12 schools), health-care provider, or non-profit, get FREE access to RingCentral Office. Download the app and call (866) 246-4093 to get started.

Here’s how RingCentral helps teams stay efficient during this time:

📞Collaborate with superior team messaging 
Message individuals or teams in real time to stay connected and bring remote workers together. Easily collaborate with file sharing, task management, and a shared calendar. All for free. No plan required.

🎥 Stay connected with seamless video meetings 
Launch video meetings directly from the app for real-time collaboration with screen sharing, chat, and markup tools.

📱Make HD calls with an enterprise phone system 
Get HD voice quality, call forwarding, and advanced call features all while displaying your business number as your caller ID. Use Wi-Fi, carrier minutes, or cellular data on any mobile device.

🖨 Use SMS for on-the-go communication 
Send and receive text messages using SMS from your RingCentral business number to communicate with clients and coworkers on the spot.

📂 Send a fax from anywhere 
Send files through your mobile device with secure and easy online faxing. Attach files from Dropbox, Box, Google Drive, or any Microsoft Office application, or submit faxes online via email.

A RingCentral Office® subscription is required for certain product features. Features will vary by product and plan. A free subscription is available with limited capabilities.

recentChanges:
• Voicemail greeting configuration is now available in the app. You can record a new custom greeting or use the default greeting.
• Faxes "in progress" will show up in the fax list.
comments: It is so handy to not have to run to my desk to answer a call. However, the screen stays on / lit up while I'm on a call. So, my cheek opens up other apps. I've even opened up Amazon music & played songs during a call by accident. This also makes it difficult to hangup the call since I can't just press end when I'm done, but rather need to toggle back to the RC app. When I'm on my "regular" cell phone app, that app blacks out the screen and doesn't open up other apps during the call.

My company used Flock before switching to Ring Central for our Dispatch to Field comms. I would give it 5 stars if it had a message delivered and message read feature like Flock. It eliminates wondering if the intended recipient has read your message or if you are being ignored. Other than that its really great. Hopefully the Devs read this and add that feature so I can give it 5 stars.

Generally good for basic functions - calling, voicemail, SMS, etc. Sending and recieving faxes is a bit cumbersome, but it's 2020 so it's not a huge deal; and it REALLY needs a way to search call logs from within the app, rather than scrolling through an unfiltered list. Integration with other apps would be nice, as well (MyCase, in my case).

The app has to be on top and the phone backlight on for the voice to transmit. During calls the app must remain the top app open. If I use my phone to do anything else while on a call, my caller loses the ability to hear me. I can hear them however. Also, if the screen cuts off during the call, same result.

I've never had such a hard time signing in in my life. Security codes don't work. Express links won't work with my browser, and single sign in only logs me in to the desktop interface for a few minutes before expiring. Needs to be fixed asap

title: Jersey Mike's
description:
Cut the line & order on the go! It's easy with the Jersey Mike's App to order & customize your favorite items, whether you like it Mike's Way® or want to create your own combination.
 
The app allows you to earn Shore Points® on every purchase of a sub, even our kids' meals and catering boxes. Want to know the best part about earning points? It's redeeming them! You can easily redeem points through the app when you make a purchase or by using a QR code to scan in store.
 
You also have access to MyMike's where you can create your account. In MyMike's you are able to sign up for our email club, track your Shore Points® and much more.
 
App Features:
- Find a location near you
- Earn & redeem Shore Points®
- Explore the menu
- Order on the go
- Customize your order
- Create your MyMike's account
- Use an existing saved payment card
- See the estimated time your order will be ready
- Add notes to your order

summary: Conveniently order food ahead and avoid the wait at your favorite Jersey Mike's.
recentChanges:
- Improved delivery support
- Various graphical updates and bug fixes
comments: I just have one problem with the app. The fact that it doesn't have the kids menu on there is kind of upsetting. It would make it easier for orders if they had that service on the application. I hope you get a chance to fix this and add the kids menu on app.

The App is always easy to use and I haven't had any glitches or other issues like I have with other food apps. Jersey Mike's grand and their employees are always great, happy, and helpful. Thank you JM!

LOVE our Chambersburg, PA Jersey Mike's! Food is always amazing staff is friendly and fun and the manager and owner are fabulous to work with for events. Super supportive of our local community, too. ❤️ The app has never let me down, either. So easy to order and pay and then go to the store, grab and go. It's saved me a long wait on numerous occasions.

I have tried logging into my account several times and it keeps saying my credentials are wrong but they arent i reset my password twice and logged in with it not working then i tried logging in as guest and the location search isnt working please fix immediately
Useless. Infinite loading screen. Created my account and the app would not find any restaurant by location or typing a location. Since then, I cannot even login to my account.

title: UPS Mobile
description:
You’re busy, so let UPS help you easily manage shipments, track packages, find UPS locations, and much more with the UPS Mobile app. Download the UPS Mobile app to: 

Track

- Find and follow your deliveries in transit
- Update your delivery location or change your delivery date
- Get delivery alerts to know when your package will arrive
 
Ship

- Estimate shipping costs and delivery times
- Take package dimensions with our in-app measurement tool
- Create a shipment and get shipping labels
 
Find the nearest UPS location to pack, send, or collect your shipments
descriptionHTML:
You’re busy, so let UPS help you easily manage shipments, track packages, find UPS locations, and much more with the UPS Mobile app. Download the UPS Mobile app to:

Track

- Find and follow your deliveries in transit
- Update your delivery location or change your delivery date
- Get delivery alerts to know when your package will arrive

Ship

- Estimate shipping costs and delivery times
- Take package dimensions with our in-app measurement tool
- Create a shipment and get shipping labels

Find the nearest UPS location to pack, send, or collect your shipments
summary: The UPS Mobile app goes where you go so you can easily manage shipments.
recentChanges:
At UPS, we use your feedback to enhance the performance of the app. New features and improvements include:

- Ongoing enhancements to accessibility functionality
- Increased login options and security
- General performance and bug fixes


Based on the California Personal Privacy Act of 2018, updates have been made to “Do Not Sell My Personal Information”. Please review these changes within the Privacy Notice on ups.com.
comments: The older version was better, in my opinion. You were allowed to sign and tell the driver where to place it, and tracking, for the most part was spot on! Now, with this newer version, it sucks!! Rarely does it update, I've only been able to sign for my package once. SUCKS! Update: 19 July 2019 App seemed to be working alright, for a bit. Now when I try to sign for an order it tells me the package I'm signing for is not in my name...app still SUCKS!

I love this app, but it needs some updates, like for example: to let the person who is wanting to ship the package out how much it actually weighs, and the actual measurements of the length, width, and height of the box that is going to be shipped out like for example: 1.75 inches or 1.5 inches, so that the person who is shipping the package out and the person who is purchasing the item or items inside of the box know how much the actual price the shipping is for any box, big or small or medium.

I really like this app. The only issue I have is that I can't delete old addresses that are no longer needed. It really causes problems when it automatically goes to the old address first. Other than that its a great app and I like it better than the other package delivery app I have. Its easier to use and less confusing.

For the most part the UPS Mobile application works great. For those who use it every day to do their business, I am sure it is a perfect tool. For those of us who only use it once in a while, though, it can be quite cumbersome and tedious. Each time I sign onto the application it has been updated and I must relearn, even update my information. And now I've received an email indicating that I may have bought a service in all my confusion.😳

Very easy to use and understand. I've only used it to track my packages because I like to have an idea of when my packages are arriving and because of porch pirates, and it's been super helpful. It's pretty up to date. I can get my package off my porch within minutes of drop off. Just love this app.

title: Simple Scan - Free PDF Scanner App
description:
Want a moving scanner?

The Simple Scanner is a PDF document scanner application that turns your phone into a portable scanner. you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. The scan will be saved to the device in image or PDF format. Name and organize your scan to a folder, or share it in the following ways:


 -Automatically upload JPG and PDF files to the cloud disk
 -Backup and restore synchronization files between multiple devices
 - E-mail, print, Fax
 - Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, WhatsApp, or more
 - Wifi connects directly to your computer
 - Support importing PDF files into JPG.
 - Support for adding tags for quick file search.
 - Support OCR text recognition, export text.




Support system: Android 4.4 and above

The Document Scanner application has all the features you need:

- Mobile phone document, automatically remove the clutter background, generate high-definition JPEG pictures or PDF files.
- A variety of image processing mode, you can manually adjust the image parameters, with a mobile phone can be paper documents, quickly turned into a clear electronic draft.
- Scan color, grayscale, or black and white
- Can be used in office, school, home and any place you want
- Automatically detects page edges
- 5 levels of contrast for clear monochrome text
- Set the PDF page size (Letter, Legal, A4, etc.)
- Thumbnail or list view, sorted by date or title
- Simple scanner are optimized to run very fast.
- Quick search by document title
- Use a password to protect your documents
- General - A single application that works on your phone!

If you like simple scanner or have any other comments, please take a moment to write us a comment, or simply email us at simple.scanner@outlook.com, which will help us improve our products and give you a better experience. .

comments: Last time I used this app I remember it being great, this time (several months later) I am greeted basically no functionality in the app unless you upgrade to the pro version or pay an in app purchase. Basically this app is no longer free from what it seems. It's also littered with ads, including ones that randomly pop up and fill the whole screen. Unfortunate.

Well, I'm waiting for the pop-up adds and upsell, but so far, they haven't come. I use this kind of app for many things. I find it quite convenient and much nicer that many comparable apps. The app I used to use has become loaded with bloatware, pop-ups and it takes way too long to get anything done. This app far exceeds them. I highly recommend Simple Scan and will do so with word-of-mouth as well.

So far for my work requirements from the app. It does really well and recalls old documents as well in case. Keeps each time I access separate which I need. No need to clean sheet it. It does it on its own for me. I just keep taking pictures and it stores, sends as I need. Simple, effective, cool.

App is simple. Too many intrusive ads. Ads will pop out and make it difficult to look at or do anything. Instead of locking up more advanced features to paying customers, the developer appears to have decided to serve ads almost to the point that free version is unusable. It would be nice if the developer could keep the basic part of the app without ads popping out.

Does exactly what it says. Plus it's still free unlike majority of all the other similar apps that started of free but now want to charge for the same service. So would rather use this app which does exactly the same as them but for free. Hopefully this won't start charging once it gets a loyal customer base.

title: Zoom Rooms
description:
Meet Happy. Bring beautiful, simple, scalable video conferencing with wireless content sharing and integrated audio to any meeting space – conference rooms, training rooms, huddle rooms, and executive offices.
 
Zoom Rooms software-based video conferencing system uses off-the-shelf, business-grade hardware for cameras, speakers, and monitors - making it the most flexible video solution. Easily connect to participants on mobile devices, desktops, and other rooms.
 
Zoom Rooms are easy to set up: 1. Configure your room on the Zoom web portal, 2. Install the Zoom Rooms application on a Mac or PC, 3. Install this app on your Android tablet, 4. Click "Meet Now" to start a meeting.
 
Key Features: 
● Best video and screen sharing quality 
● Quick setup to install Zoom Rooms with Outlook Exchange or Google Calendar
 ● Wireless screen sharing from any device
  ● Supports up to 3 HD screens to fit any conference room
● View the active speaker, shared content, or gallery view with 25 video feeds
  ● One-click room-to-room calling 
● Up to 500 interactive participants or 10,000 view-only attendees (optional add-on)
● Record your meetings to share or review later
● Connect with anyone on Zoom Rooms, Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, H.323/SIP room systems, telephones, and other devices

comments: I have been used this application it was very useful, , but with the new tablet it doesn't work ..can you help me to find a solution for this proplem? Thanks zoom group.
Please how do i get the paring code
Does not work
Dont bother, its rubbish
so easy to use!

title: Tiny Scanner - PDF Scanner App
description:
Tiny Scanner is a little scanner app that turns android device into a portable document scanner and scan everything as images or PDFs.

With this pdf document scanner app you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. This pdf document scanner app is lightning fast and gorgeously designed for both phone and tablet.

IS THAT A SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET?

Tiny Scanner is a pdf document scanner app that turns your mobile into a portable scanner. Scans are saved to your device as images or PDFs. Name and organize your scans into folders, or share them by:

- Email
- Wifi directly to your computer
- Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive or Box(Available in pro version)

This document scanner app has all the BIG features you need:

* Scan in color, grayscale, or black & white
* Can be used in office, school, home and anywhere else you want
* Page edges are detected automatically
* 5 levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts
* Set page sizes for PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more)
* Thumbnail or list view, sort scans by date or title
* Tiny Scanner is optimized to run very fast.
* Quick search by document title
* Protect your documents with a passcode
* Universal – a single app that works on phone and tablet too!

The free version is an ad-supported version and has some function restrictions, we also offer an ad-free version which is available as in-app purchase or the individual pro version.

Permissions Used in Tiny Scanner:
1. Storage: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to store docs in your phone.
2. Camera: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to use camera to scan docs.

GOT QUESTIONS? CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO DO SOMETHING?
If you have any problem about this scanner app please email us at tinyscan.a@appxy.com, and we’ll help you figure it out.

Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official
Like us on Facebook: Appxy
Follow us on Google+: Appxy

comments: I scanned a few documents to try it out. Then it gives you the option to send them through email but when you click send it goes to the motions that the email was sent. It's like they want you to pay the $5 or it takes your documents hostage and won't let you do anything with them. Screw this app, just a waste of time. Why would you pay for an app that you don't know the quality of the scanned documents or if it works at all.

I just have a try and now I've fallen love with it. It is absolutely EXCELLENT! There's a great feature that you can easily modify the gray scale just after taking the photo. I haven't seen other apps can do this such easily. Also, you can use all the core features without purchasing a pro, ads-free! Although you can't save the results to some three-party apps with a free version, but you can simply save it to your phone! Great app! But I will still buy the pro, just wanna support it.

There are lots of options, so there's bound to be one that fits what you need. The UI is simple and ready-to-use, with a very low learning curve. It is a little frustrating to see a few options blocked behind a paywall, but they're really just quality of life functions, and the developers have to earn money somehow. It's just a really good application.

What a huge joke this app, I mean AD is! I downloaded it today, tried it out on a couple papers I need. That was only a few hours ago. I just tried to use it but all I get is a box asking if I want to buy it from within the app, Or if I want to download the pro version. This explains the complaints of paying and then told they don't have pro version. Just a money scam don't pay for pro!

Pro app doesn''t work as advertised. In order to do multiple pages, I had to upgrade to the pro version. When I did, however, both the quality of the scan with the multi-page selection was lower in the ability to actually add a second page didn't seem to be available in the app. So far, I have heard nothing from technical support, so 1 star. I'd rate it more lowly, given that they have essentially taken my money for no good reason, but that's not an option.

title: Steady - Find Work. Earn Money
description:
Install Steady for FREE today and join our community of over a million members.

Steady is here to help you look after your financial health - from matching you with opportunities to make Extra Money, to providing you an income tracker to monitor your earnings, to ensuring you have the benefits you need while you work.

We want to inspire and connect our members to extra income opportunities. Discover and share ways to increase your earnings and motivate others to do the same. We want you to focus more on your future making money. So how do we do that?

*We are constantly adding new extra income opportunities.
And every new job posting is a new opportunity for you to make more money.

*We know that finding extra income is time-consuming.
The Steady app helps you search and filter extra income opportunities that meet your financial needs, your availability and your skill set.

*We help you tackle your financial goals.
Steady’s Income Tracker lets you focus on what you are earning and understand where your money is coming from rather than just keeping an eye on what you’re spending.

*We want to inspire you to not only increase your earnings but feel motivated by the progress.
There are a variety of reasons people look for extra income. For some, it is a long-term plan to free themselves from unwanted debt. For others, it is more short-term, looking for extra income to pay for a vacation or fund a child’s school trip.

Download Steady for FREE today. Create your account, find work and make extra money alongside the Steady workers who are changing the way Americans work and live. The goal of the Steady community is to help you find new jobs, make extra money, get stronger financially and feel motivated by the progress.

To learn more about Steady- our team, our vision, and our accomplishments visit https://www.steadyapp.com. Have more questions or need a helping hand? Please email us at help@steadyapp.com.

recentChanges:
We are excited to introduce the Financial Stability Plan! Create your personalized plan in under two minutes and start your journey to increase your income and improve your financial health. Financial stability may seem like it’s out of reach, but it doesn’t have to be. Steady is here to help.

Just as much as we want to help you, we’d love for you to help us. Please send suggestions and feedback to help@steadyapp.com.
comments: Pretty cool app! Free and easy to use. Have used the boosters and for opening up a bank account and following the guidelines to qualify for a booster I received $75! It's legit. I NEVER sign up for anything or believe the hype with apps but this one is real. It tells you things you can do locally to earn some extra cash or things to make a more full time income. It's easier than Googling and searching. It's free try it if you don't like it uninstall. I'm going to continue doing the boosters and see what else is available in my area to make extra cash. Btw that extra $75 cost me nothing. I received it for doing something I was already looking to do by opening up an online bank account and spending $25 within a month. No big deal. Easiest money I've ever made. You have nothing to lose.

The app itself has worked pretty sufficiently. But Steady is an awesome concept. I have already received $50 in gift cards from "Income Boosters" and it has encouraged me to start doing food deliveries. I'd say the only downfall, though very small, is that they can change the amount you're rewarded at anytime, even if you're in the middle of completing a booster task. But other than that, I've had no problems with the app and they reward exactly as promised. Pretty large amounts might I add. :)

I have had the best experience using this app! I received a $40 Visa card in my email from Steady as soon as I completed my 1st Instacart shop. I actually had completely forgotten about the Income Booster & it was such a great surprise!!! Thank you so much Steady!!! I recommend this app to everyone, it's awesome!!!

Honestly I have played with things like this since I was a teenager and have never found any of them to actually work. Steady far excelled my expectations I receive a $75 E gift card For opening up An online Bank account. Which after a given period of time I assumed I would not receive because it was not Listed on my in progress list, So I reached out to steady and received a prompt reply that they were going to contact The bank To verify and within a matter of 2 weeks i Got the gift card

I earned $15 in a few minutes, just by filling out and completing one offer. Not all offers give cash or deposits into bank accounts; sometimes you get a Visa GC. Otherwise, pretty nifty! (FYI: Deposits and Visa GC ARE NOT INSTANT and can take weeks to receive!)

title: UltiPro
description:
Ultimate Software's UltiPro mobile app delivers instant and secure access to relevant employee information and tools. Managers can make informed decisions and take immediate action with real-time data synchronization. 

Employees can quickly access their personal HR and pay information, communicate with coworkers, request time off, and more. The UltiPro mobile app makes it easy for managers to respond to employee requests with the ability to receive push notifications. 

Download the app now and stay connected at work, in the field, and on the go. 

Please note, the UltiPro mobile app is only available to authorized customers of UltiPro.
descriptionHTML:
Ultimate Software's UltiPro mobile app delivers instant and secure access to relevant employee information and tools. Managers can make informed decisions and take immediate action with real-time data synchronization.

Employees can quickly access their personal HR and pay information, communicate with coworkers, request time off, and more. The UltiPro mobile app makes it easy for managers to respond to employee requests with the ability to receive push notifications.

Download the app now and stay connected at work, in the field, and on the go.

Please note, the UltiPro mobile app is only available to authorized customers of UltiPro.
summary: Ultimate Software’s ULTIPRO at your fingertips.
recentChanges:
This release contains bug fixes and UX enhancements.

Contact your HR department for login instructions and a list of enabled features prior to downloading. Please note that access to UltiPro's mobile app and features within are only available to UltiPro customers.

We regularly update our app to bring you app improvements and new features. Thanks for using UltiPro!
comments: Forever loading, error after error after freaking error. This has to be the most garbage app I've ever been forced to use. If you do happen to get past the f*****g loading screen you have a 99% chance of falling into the dumpster fire of error messages. Good luck getting to your time card with this.

Very basic and not very good. Please just clone the ADP app, it is close to perfect. This app looks like it is trying to do similar things, but isn't there yet. Why can I only see a donut graph for my current pay check? When I select another pay period it should show both the graph and the details for the selected pay period. I also liked that you could compare 2 pay periods side by side in the ADP app. This app also feels slow, like it is just a mobile website instead of a native app.
It would be nice if I can type my time in timecard instead of scrolling. Everytime I save my time it kept saying calculation is busy. Please fix.

Menu structure is poorly laid out. For example, why is view and request time off two different pages?! It should just be one page with all the information right in front of your eyes if you scroll. The app also lacks functionality that is important which normally the website provides. Like viewing company holidays before scheduling time off! Seems to be something common enough to do, but all it offers is a mediocre interface to schedule time off. All in all, this app could be done a lot better.
As we plan for disasters it has come to our attention that employee emergency contact information is not visible in the app. Only the desktop site.

title: FedEx
description:
Create a shipping label, track shipment status and manage your packages wherever you are with the FedEx Mobile app. Use the FedEx Mobile app to get quick rates, find a pickup or dropoff location, scan barcodes, and view rewards. Enroll in FedEx Delivery Manager® to customize when and where you’d like to receive your packages.

Available in all regions
•    Track the status of all incoming or outgoing packages
•    Enable push notifications to get updates on your shipments*
•    Scan a barcode for easy tracking*
•    Find a FedEx location near you*
•    Get shipment cost estimates and delivery times
•    Log in with the touch of a finger
•    Search your list of shipments by tracking number, references, vendors, and more

Available in some regions
•    Create a mobile shipment label and request a pickup**
•    Enroll in FedEx Delivery Manager to:
o    Hold a package at a preferred FedEx location
o    Leave delivery instruction for the courier
o    Sign for a package requiring your signature
o    Request a vacation hold
•    Reroute your package to a FedEx location to pick up at your convenience
•    Scan your door tag to get information and options regarding your missed shipment
•    Access a Chat assistant for FedEx Mobile app and services questions
•    Create a login for more convenient tracking
•    View Rewards

Thank you for using the FedEx Mobile app! For any feedback, email us at mobile@fedex.com.

FedEx Delivery Manager is only available for residential deliveries within the U.S. You must be signed in to the FedEx Mobile app and registered for FedEx Delivery Manager to use selected features.

*Maximize your FedEx experience by allowing the following permissions: Location to find a convenient FedEx location, Camera to scan a shipping label and track a package, and Push Notifications to receive notification on a package.

**Shipping administration rules apply.

*Maximize your FedEx experience by allowing the following permissions: Location to find a convenient FedEx location, Camera to scan a shipping label and track a package, and Push Notifications to receive notification on a package.

**Shipping administration rules apply.
summary:
On the go?
Take FedEx with you.
recentChanges:
Thank you for choosing the FedEx® Mobile app. We update our app regularly to add new features and make other improvements to enhance the value and performance of the FedEx Mobile app.

This release includes:
• Bug fixes, design enhancements, and other ongoing performance improvements
comments: Every time I try to log in it says user name or password incorrect. EVERY TIME. I know what it is. I don't need to reset it, because I know what it is. Thought this would be an easy way to track my packages that never show up on time. NEVER. Nevermind the fact that every day they on on a truck to be delivered by 9 PM. Really odd considering customer support says FedEx doesn't deliver past 8 PM. Apparently they don't work on Saturdays either in my area. Hope you go bankrupt incompetent asses.

Awful bugs. Have to type in Username and password almost every time, even if less than two hours have passed. Have enabled the fingerprint option in app, every single time I login, to make this easier. Fingerprint option works for my banking and other apps however it does not matter how many times I enable in this app. If my parents didn't order so many packages that I have to make sure each driver will leave, I would uninstall. But I have to check this one at least daily. Can't count on noti

This app is incredibly helpful, I am registered. But knowing where my packages are and when to expect them is very good idea. Sometimes packages need to be signed for, and sent to my billing address. It's outstanding that I can have it held a a local drop off location.

Quick to update the delivery details. Easy to know when to expect your package. This app let me know second that my package was available for pickup. The FedEx office that had my package had it on a cart for me to get it to my vehicle. Picking it up was very simple with my ID. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone who is dealing with FedEx for any reason. Such an easy way to deal with the process of deliveries.

They definitely update you the very second something changes with your package everytime. You just need to set it up to get notifications with your package, then your all set to get updates, you can even set it up to get text messages as well for updates.

title: Facebook Pages Manager
description:
Manage your Facebook Page, right from your phone. With the Pages Manager app you can stay informed and respond to customers immediately.

Mobile posting: post updates and manage your Page without using a computer.

Messages: read and reply to messages that your customers send to your Page.

Facebook and Instagram: link your accounts to manage Facebook messages, comments on your posts and Instagram comments in one inbox.

Push notifications: get alerts about important activity, and see all of your Page notifications in one place.

Insights: track promotions, stats and activity on your Page so you can build your business.

Anyone who manages a Facebook Page can download and use this app for free.

summary: Manage your Page, wherever you are.
comments: Terrible app. Wish I didn't have to use it. It doesn't load the page when you try and scroll down. It's doesn't load new messages, it doesn't load recent notifications. There will notifications that are know are there that simply aren't showing in the notifications tab, but then you can find them on the other notifications tab (as if you need two?!) But then you click on the notification which takes you to the post but the comment isn't even there, same with messages. Just completely useless.

Hi, this app very good for the beginning.. It easy to use and very helpful. But, in this month it had a problem. I already Uninstalll this app for one weeks to see what happen. Then, now i install it again and still the same. I already refresh then it same. I can't see any post in my page. Please help me.

Very delayed updates; though the app notifies me of messages from clients, I don't get to see them no matter how many times I refresh. It has taken up to several hours just for it to update and show me the new messages. Because of this, I am unable to respond to clients immediately, especially urgent concerns. Please fix this! If it can work better in that aspect alone it would definitely fulfill its purpose to help admins who are constantly on the go.

When I first got the app in Jan 2020 I loved it. However, it has only gotten worse with the new updates. I keep getting a million emtpy mobile albums when doing pics. With the newest update I can't upload my pictures in a post, to the album I want. At all. I can't upload videos and pictures together anymore. Videos can't even go into albums. If I attach a picture in post, I can't schedule it anymore. Has to be published then and there. It sucks. I'm disappointed. I love the old version better..

Constantly updating the app but nothing looks different and nothing changes, it looks and operates exactly the same. Another problem is, I can never delete the notifications. I "delete" them and they come right back. I also get notifications late. Plus, there's an option to see who "likes" your page but why can't we see who's"following" our page? I'm really not enjoying this app.

title: CamToPlan - AR measurement / tape measure
description:
Measure anything with CamToPlan! Horizontally and vertically! Length, distance, area of any surface… Measure everything with this virtual ruler and tape measure thanks to augmented reality and ARCore. 

Measuring a length is now easier than with a laser meter or any other measure tool. You draw your measurement lines in 3D thanks to the camera directly on the video of your phone or tablet. You export your plans in PNG or DXF. CamToPlan is the AR measuring app that brings your measures from cam…to…plan !

For personal or professional use, always measure like a pro. Thanks to Virtual Reality (VR), you can measure floors, dimensions of walls, windows, doors or a whole home in a few seconds. No more tape measure or ruler needed!

This app has infinite applications for everybody:
- Personal use: the length measure app for the handyman who loves DIY !
- Real estate professionals (real estate agent, interior design decorator or designer, architect, topographer, energy adviser...): this app will help you make a floorplan of a house, apartment, a specific room of a flat.
- Construction workers can use it to quickly measure jobs : concreter, tile layer, carpet fitter, painter, drywall guy, plasterer, builder, carpenter, electrician, plumber, slater... 
- For gardener, landscaper, swimming pool builders and maintenance, digger, earth-moving, navvy: this app also works outside
- Cost estimation professionals: this length measure app can make pricing estimates, it will be a great assistant for quantity surveyor, price studies technician, economist…
- Building industry: foreman, site manager or engineer can drop their tape measure and ruler to perform a quick measurement check

How does this measuring app work?
It relies on ARCore by Google. Machine learning algorithms combine the device sensors data (accelerometer, gyroscope…) with odometry which analyses in real time the video of the camera and relies on visual details of images, in order to scan the environment and find the position and rotation angle of the device.

Please note: 
- you can measure in metric (meters, centimeters) or imperial units (feet, inches)
- the app measures distances horizontally (= on the ground) and vertically!
- no need to remove the furniture from the room for measurements. The application determines the intersection between the floor and the target, even if it is hidden.
- The application may have difficulty with some types of tiles. The accuracy is not guaranteed.
- you can move while performing measurements to get closer to your target point, for maximum precision, even if it is not visible and calculated by extrapolation.

Terms of use: http://misc.tasmanic.com/camtoplanpolicy.html
Privacy policy: http://misc.tasmanic.com/androidctpprivacypolicy.html

75008 - PARIS
FRANCE
comments: Amazing technology... Only problem is there's no "light" version of the app, just a free trial. After a few days it's over $20 a month. Well worth it though if its something you'd use on a regular basis
Very much ads. The program is unstable and inaccurate

Not stable, that flash with a compass at the base keeps blocking my view of the surface area I'm trying to measure using my "Pied" Samsung Galaxy A7 (SM-A750F). Everytime I measure the same surface, I end up with different measurements and tracing a target area is difficult.
Functionality is good, but has a TON of ads and free version won't let you upload any version of the file or even take a screenshot.
You can't get through one room with the free trial without paying for the year. BS

title: Shipt Shopper: Shop for Pay
description:
GET PAID TO SHOP AND DELIVER GROCERIES

Shipt is on the lookout for friendly, reliable shoppers to earn money helping Shipt members get the things they need from stores they trust. Apply at shipt.com/shopper to become a shopper and earn up to $22/hour (or more!), set your own schedule, shop and deliver from local stores, and join a thriving community of Shipt Shoppers. If you’re looking for a flexible gig job and want to earn on your own schedule, then apply today.

EARN UP TO $22 PER HOUR AND GET PAID FAST

Apply to be a Shipt Shopper to start earning on your own schedule. Each delivery takes about an hour and can pay as much as $22 or more including tips. You’ll receive a direct deposit every Friday for the deliveries you completed and any in-app tips you’ve earned that week – we make sure you always receive 100% of your tips!

CREATE A SCHEDULE THAT WORKS FOR YOU

Your schedule is based on when you want to shop and deliver, so you can choose to work and earn as little – or as much – as you like. So whether you’re looking to shop part time or shop full time, you can set your perfect schedule. 

APPLY, SHOP, AND EARN MORE MONEY

With no cap on how many orders you can shop, earn what’s right for you! You can even increase the number of orders you’re offered – simply shop and deliver during your preferred times, and strive to deliver 5 star service!

JOIN A COMMUNITY OF SHOPPERS AND CUSTOMERS

More than just a gig economy job, you’ll join a community of shoppers. Share inside tips and stories with other shoppers, and take pride in providing a valuable service to the people in your community that need it most.

JOIN THE TEAM

We’re always on the lookout for hiring shoppers that can help us deliver happiness.
Visit shipt.com/shopper/ to learn more and apply!
