summary: View and Listen to your Voicemails
recentChanges: Our latest Visual Voicemail release provides extended support for Android Pie and Q as well as making a number of bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements
comments: I just love the app. I've used it for years now with your company but as of late I keep just getting random alerts saying can't access visual voicemail please try again later. I have a Moto E5 play. Please fix this issue/issues. Maybe you should find an updated license for your service for Metro PCS T-Mobile high-speed internet. I don't pay for everything unlimited just to have malfunctions

Use to be a great App. Not anymore. Can not retrieve any messages. Messages do not upload to the app. When I receive a call and it goes to voicemail, I receive a notification that there is a message from that number but when when I go to the app, there is nothing to view. This keeps happening. Will give it a five star if this issue is fixed.

The reason Y Ive gotten this app because I have recieved many unwanted calls it"s no better way than to see who these calls are & where they're calling from plus the times they call n, this visual voicemail USE TO provide this sort info which is the reason WHY I wanted the app WELL its been acting up for awhile not sure Y or what the problem is even when I refresh it, IT CONTINUES not working nor has it shown any recent incoming calls or numbr+continues to apolgize due to not working !!!!!!

This app sucks it keep telling me that voice to text is down and i have not been able for the last two months been able to get voice to text i even refreshed the app and it might work once after that and then i get a pop up saying that its not working on my phone again!! I have a metro service for several years pay good money and problem after problem keeps happening not just with there visiual voicemail but other problems. Just got a new phone recently and i have had nothing but problems withit

I was I was extremely happy with the service untilI, I realized and had someone inform me. That the application was not very secure, and people were using that to track me, listen to me, and spy on me with my camera. Since I wasn't doing anything "really", that I needed to worry about. So I wasn't that concerned at all. it really didn't affect me very much. I just was a little Disturbed and upset with the security situation of their company, so I became consernd, & suspicious of there employees

title: Cisco Webex Teams
description:
Cisco Webex Teams is an app for continuous teamwork. Move work forward in secure work spaces where everyone can contribute anytime with messaging, file sharing, white boarding, video meetings, calling, and more. It works on virtually any device, with these top benefits for mobile app users:

• Streamline Teamwork: One place for all the tools that help you do your job better and faster. Create spaces for you and another person or for a group working on a project.
• Make Better Decisions: Start and join meetings instantly. See everyone with an amazing HD video experience. Share your screen. Keep teamwork going in the connected work space.
• Stay Informed About All Your Work: Select from our growing catalog of integrations and bots to keep up to date with what's happening in other apps such as Box and Salesforce
• Find Anything Fast: Search for people, messages, and files across all your spaces - no need to switch accounts or views
• Bring The Experience Into Meeting Rooms: Pair your app to a Webex device, such as the Webex Board, to do things like wirelessly control meetings and save whiteboard drawings
• Work Securely: Built for business collaboration with end-to-end encryption

Want to do more with Webex Teams? Visit webex.com.

recentChanges:
We added these features:

• Create a custom status
• Turn on separate chats and spaces for everyone
• Support disabling @ mentions to all

comments: Permissions are a bit strange. You can't join a meeting unless you enable both camera, mic, and give it the ability to manage calls. Last time I checked you don't need any of those to participate in a one way presentation type meeting. Permissions should only be asked for when the relevant feature is requested by the user. Example video and mic should only be asked for when the user turns on mic and video manually.

This app is so frustrating. Everytime I scroll up, it jumps back about 2 days worth of feed and have to scroll all the way back down. Sometimes when I open it, it will tell me that I have no active chats, force close or just not work. I have installed the most recent update, so I know it's just the app itself. Wouldn't use it if I didn't have to for work.

This is a terrible app. I do not go two minutes without it crashing and then crashing my phone as a result. If I scroll up on a convo it jumps to like a 100 messages back. This application is so bad, I avoid using it out of fear of it crashing my phone. If I see a notification from this app, I wait to get to my laptop to see who is messaging me. You can do better than this Cisco.

Why is there no toggle for notification banners? I hate having my phone's audio dimmed with a barely audible sound, but with no quick way to preview and/or dismisse the message. Overall it's a pretty good experience, but the app is lacking basic functionality vs the desktop client. I hope to see message editing and separation of favorite channels soon.

1. Even after call is disconnected the notifications bar shows call is in progress. In this case sign out and sign in back to the app is required to remove this false notification info. 2. 50% of the time this app does not create temporary space for the scheduled meetings. Users whose PC not installed with webex meetings gets frustrated.

title: Dayforce
description:
Need access to your work life at your convenience? Dayforce puts you in the driver’s seat with an engaging, intuitive mobile experience to easily manage your work tasks. Whether you’re an employee wanting to submit time off, or a manager needing to action a team member’s request, Dayforce has you covered.

As an employee, being able to access work-related tasks quickly is critical, so you can focus on your job. From checking your schedule, to requesting pay instantly, to setting performance goals, Dayforce lets you manage these tasks from your mobile device.

For managers, supporting your team is a top priority. Being able to respond to employee requests promptly and connect with them when needed improves your effectiveness as a manager. Whether you’re approving a shift trade or time off, or reviewing and authorizing worked time, or simply reaching out to potential candidates, Dayforce builds upon its employee capabilities with even deeper manager functionality.

See how Dayforce can improve work life by providing secure, mobile access to your data, so you can save time, and accomplish tasks more easily.

Please note: Dayforce mobile access is only available to Dayforce customers. If you are an employee of a Dayforce client, please check with your employer before downloading the app to see if they have activated the mobile option.

Disclaimer: Dayforce mobile features will be limited to the Dayforce web version that has been deployed to your organization.

recentChanges: • Bug fixes, performance enhancements and usability improvements.
comments: Even though I have it set to see all my coworkers, I cannot see all my coworkers. At least 9 of my 29 coworkers are not visible to me and those missing 9 coworkers are the only ones with whom I could swap shifts! What the heck!?! It would also be nice if I could see/print my schedule when it is posted so I can post it at home. Having to access my device to write my hours on my wall calendar at home is cumbersome and clunky. Its okay. Wish I could see coworkers, and share my weekly schedule.

as a time clock, dayforce is a nuisance I find myself waiting... to log on... waiting... for the blue circle to stop spinning... waiting... for it to recognize my location. I try not to use the app on my phone (too frustrating), but instead use it via the PC at work.
Very useful. My schedules, requests for time off, pay info and important messages are all here. I don't know how I got along without it. Excellent application.

Great with keeping up with your work shifts and timecard. Could definitely use more features like payroll information would be helpful. Also, have a hard time trying to enable the fingerprint authentication to save password to login.
The app is slow, sends notifications that you have a message when you have none, and is anything but intuitive.

title: Amazon A to Z
description:
Amazon A to Z gives you access to all the tools to manage your work-life at Amazon. Use the app to manage your profile information, submit time off requests, check your schedule, claim extra shifts, see the latest news, and more.
 
Getting started:
 
• As an Amazon hourly Associate, download the A to Z app
• Login with your Amazon login credentials (not your personal Amazon account)
• Update your profile if needed with your phone number and emergency contact
• Verify your direct deposit information
• Configure your notification preferences to stay in the know
 
After getting the basics out of the way, A to Z will be your portal to everything from schedule management to getting your Amazon.com discount code.
 
Feature highlights:
 
• Time: submit time off requests, check your accrual balances, and claim voluntary extra time or time off 
• Schedule: view in/out times, upcoming shifts, and calendar
• Pay: view pay, tax, and direct deposit information
• News: stay up to date with the latest happenings internal to Amazon
• Profile: update personal information, emergency contacts, and view your Amazon.com discount code
• Resources: visit several other employee resources for new jobs, retirement planning, learning management, and more

recentChanges:
- Support for 64-bit devices
- We are aware some users are facing login issues. We apologize for the inconvenience and will have a solution soon!
comments: This App is disappointing at best. Why do I have to constantly verify my device? No matter how many times I've signed in And verified my device told it to remember This device I Still have to jump through the same hoops to sign in. I'm all about my info being secured however that is ridiculous. Im going to uninstall this app and continue to use the webpage.
At times the app works so slowly as to be useless. It seems the coding is very optimized and causes slow response.
Relatively well designed app. Has some bugs and lack of properly connecting to profiles for employees. May need to see an update to make for a well rounded app.
Good hub app. Sometimes kind of slow but it usually gets the job done.
Been like 2 and a half months working and still cant log in... still same issue with putting the verification code in and password and the loop continues... it's an issue a lot of folks are having

title: Night Owl Connect
description:
Night Owl Connect helps you keep an eye on your world, from anywhere in the world. Monitor your home or business, in real time, on your Smart Phone or Tablet. Easily share images and recordings via your favorite social network or through email and text. Be smart, be safe, be connected!

Night Owl Connect Features:

Quick and easy mobile setup
Live video and audio from your Cameras on Wi-Fi or 3G/4G LTE networks
Easily configure push notifications from your Smart Device
Save recordings directly to your Smart Device
Save images directly to your Smart Device and share via text, email or social media
Share important MP4 formatted videos via email or social media
Video playback
Multiple logins/users
Two-way audio
Google Integration (Limited devices)
Fish Eye Camera
Human Detection, Familiar Face, and Unfamiliar Face Alerts

Night Owl Security Products is a leading innovator in the security technology industry. As the fastest growing manufacturer of security DVRs, NVR’s, and Cameras, Night Owl offers the best value on the market. This is accomplished by designing and engineering products that are high quality, user friendly, and affordable. Our video surveillance equipment is used by homeowners, businesses, federal and municipal organizations, retailers, dealers, distributors and integrators across the globe.

Visit us at www.NightOwlSP.com for more information on all our products and services.

Night Owl Connect is compatible with the following Night Owl Devices:

WDB-20
WDB-20-V2
WG-20W-4
WCM-SD2POU-BU
WCM-SD2PIN
WCM-SD2POU-BU-V2
DVR-C20X-8
DVR-C20X-16
DVRH-C20X-8
DVRH-C20X-16
WNVR-C20-8
DVR-C50X-8
DVR-C50X-16
NVR-IC82-8
NVR-IC84-16
DVR-C50XFR-16
DVR-C80XFR-8
WCM-2FEIN

WARNING: This application uses data to connect your Cameras to your Smart Device. When connected to a 3G or 4G LTE network, the live video feed from your Camera will be considered streaming data by your phone service provider and will contribute to any data or download limit your phone data plan may have. If you exceed your data plan limit, this may result in additional usage charges. It is highly recommended to contact your phone service provider to know the limit of your data plan before using this video streaming application.

recentChanges: As our engineers prepare for the end of the decade, they felt obligated to squeeze in some updates and bug fixes for Night Owl Connect. The update includes a fix for compatibility issues some users experienced with Android OS v10. There were several other bugs that were fixed, but they are way too complicated to explain. Just know that Night Owl Connect is now better than ever!
comments: I mainly bought this because it has an app and I can check on things when I'm not home. But the app is horrible. I've been through all the troubleshooting, more than once and nothing. It freezes all the time, have to restart my phone several times just to get it work, I get a motion detection notification and it won't take me to it to show me. I paid a lot of money for this and I'm disabled and can't work, so this is a huge investment for me. I hope this gets fixed really soon.

If I could give negative stars I would. I cannot play back events via the app on either my Android or iPhone on good wifi networks. After 5 attempts to reach someone on live chat support I was told it would be escalated to level 2 support. Never heard from anyone. Contacted support again and told the same thing. No one ever contacted me. Still have the issue and sent 2 more emails. Still no response. I travel for work which is the sole purpose of purchasing this system and it's useless.

I have a DVR 1080P WD Wired Security System with 10 cams. The app is a poor design. You can't control video play back. You have to play from start to end no jumping to middle of video. so if your continuous recording good luck. Poor interface for pulling up calendar of recorded video. Unable to remotely configure DVR. No remote control of PTZ cams. Tech support unwilling to say what features are being developed/improved for the app and when releases are scheduled. I'm disappointed with app.

Honestly , the cameras are great. This app is terrible. Good luck having consistent notifications, they randomly just stop. Also the cameras show up as "offline" constantly. So you have to uninstall and reinstall the app because logging in and out doesn't help. This app deserves no stars. Like I said cameras are fantastic, this app is absolute GARBAGE.

Would be great if only you were able to always view the event selected but after sliding the timeline to the event (red line) you wish to view two or three times, if you try to go to yet another event, it will keep sliding back to the last event viewed no matter how hard you try to convince it that you really want to view the new event you are selecting. Also drives me nuts that NOON on the timeline STILL is labeled 12AM instead of 12PM (goes 11AM, 12AM, 1PM}! Devs, fix it already, please!

title: Square Appointments: Booking, Scheduling, Payments
description:
Square Appointments has everything you need to run your business from anywhere: online booking  that’s easy for you and your customers, a point of sale  that tracks customer details, and a secure, fast payments system —all in one place. It’s free for individuals. And really affordable for teams. Get 24/7 online booking, automatic appointment reminders, seamless payment processing, and no-show protection with Square Appointments for Android.

FREE FOR INDIVIDUALS
• Running your business with Square Appointments is free for individuals. Sole proprietors only pay for processing. If you have additional staff and need more calendars, try it out with a 30-day free trial.

LET CLIENTS BOOK 24/7
• No website? No problem—Square Appointments includes a free online booking site, so your customers can book anytime, from anywhere. Easily manage and accept bookings from the app on Android. And go to your Square Dashboard to turn on bookings with Google Search, Maps, Instagram, and more.

SEAMLESSLY CHECK OUT CLIENTS
• Every calendar entry has a checkout button, so you can quickly and easily accept payments, sell products, or send invoices all from one app. Customers can allow Square to save their card on file through their customer account for even faster checkout.

REDUCE NO-SHOWS
• Clients get automated appointment reminders, and you can request prepayment or charge a cancellation fee for online booking.

GET TO KNOW YOUR CLIENTS
• Keep notes on all your clients so you can keep track of their preferences and appointment and sales history.

This is more than just a calendar. Square Appointments is powerful appointment scheduling, a point of sale, and payment processing—all in one place.

recentChanges:
We update our apps regularly to make sure they’re at 100%, so we suggest turning on automatic updates on devices running Square Appointments.

Thanks for selling with Square. Questions? We’re here to help: square.com/help.
comments: This app is missing the location option, the address of the onsite location for businesses that don't have clients coming to their location, for example, plumbers, roofers, etc.., need to enter the location of the site of appt. It's available in the desktop version but missing from the mobile app. Without this option this app is useless for onsite service type businesses. PLEASE FIX so it correlates with the desktop version!!!

After version 5.31 any edits made to appointments are not saved after pressing "Save". Fix this very critical bug! Also: Add ability to change a location from "default" (business location) to "customer's address" when creating an appointment through this app. Then it would be 5 stars

Is any one having g issues with the time zone sending the wrong appointment time to clients. I moved time zones and I have followed all the instructions given to fix the problem I changed it in settings, changed it in customers profile and even uninstalled and reinstalled. I have looked for a number to call square but that has been a no go. I loved this app until recently. HELP! Cause I want to keep loving it!

So far so good but I believe it could use couple things. 1. Online booking link needs to have fewer characters cant put on my business card 2. E Cards clients should be able to go directly to my online booking site and buy E Cards. They cant as of yet.
Needs to have the same abilities as the website in terms of scheduling. The ability to change address of service, changing recurring appointments, and altering schedule blocks/hours would be ideal.

title: Workplace by Facebook
description:
We believe organizations work best when everyone has a voice and the power to make a difference. So we created Workplace, a collaboration tool that lets you and your coworkers:

- Create groups for your teams and projects, and use them to share unlimited project updates, files, videos, photos, ideas and more.

- Get work done anywhere, moving seamlessly between your computer and phone or tablet.

- Send messages and make voice and video calls using Workplace Chat.

You can use the app to sign into an existing Workplace account, or create one from scratch.

Workplace is ad-free and totally separate from Facebook. So you and your team can concentrate on aligning your goals, building successful working relationships and turning your company into a community.

We believe organizations work best when everyone has a voice and the power to make a difference. So we created Workplace, a collaboration tool that lets you and your coworkers:

You can use the app to sign into an existing Workplace account, or create one from scratch.

Workplace is ad-free and totally separate from Facebook. So you and your team can concentrate on aligning your goals, building successful working relationships and turning your company into a community.
summary: Connect with coworkers, collaborate anywhere.
comments: Mostly a great experience. It's both a powerful and useful tool for spreading information and increasing collaboration within companies. It does however, based on my own observations, have more bugs than it's big brother (the Facebook app).

It has all the annoyances and few features, endless, absolutely endless , hard-sell self-promotion notifications. If they just suppressed the mindless, USE WORPLACE, notifications, so one only received the occasional real one, it might rank above TERRIBLE. Yes, forced to use it by organisation, no free will I involved.

Using this app for the first time and stuck in an infinite loop. Selected the login option and got the alert "Sorry, we were unable to find an account with the following email address". No problem, so I selected the sign up option and got the alert "(email address) is already registered on Workplace. Just tap 'Continue' to log in." Tapped continue, tried logging in again, failed again. I'm not logged into Workplace on any other device because same issue. What is happening... boo
Very inefficient, hard to use , lack of tutorials , didn't receive an email although the admin tried many times to reach me

So frustrating!! I haven't been able to to get on my account since it logged me out, have told my managers and company I work for and they can't even get me on yet everyone else can. Keeps telling me to use a one time passcode, but apparently that doesn't exist. Tried making a new account several times but it makes it as the whole company. I have to have this for my job but nothing is working, beyond frustrated...

title: 1st Up
description:
1st Up by SocialChorus is a workforce communications app that helps companies reach employees with relevant, personalized information they need to do their best work. 1st Up solves the problem of poor employee engagement by keeping all workers informed and connected. Employees have one place to find out what’s happening at work—no more searching through emails and intranets to get information. Companies have an easier, faster way to publish content and news and can measure how many employees engaged with their content. 


Why you’ll love 1st Up: 


* An official source for all workforce communications—reach every worker with the information they need to know to do their best work.
* Push notifications and reminders for breaking news or time-sensitive tasks
* Ability to upload and share videos, photos, documents, or articles
* Personalized user experience with profiles and the ability to choose channels to follow
* A simple way to save and find important information with bookmarking and powerful search
* The ability for users to comment and share
* A powerful way to connect everyone at your company  and create a better digital employee experience for all

recentChanges:
Assistant, giving companies the ability to integrate with different technology systems to streamline access and make employees more productive with all resources in one place
View links, resources and important news in assistant
Target assistant configurations to different audiences
Easier way to remove a pre-populated email address from login
Easier switch between Org Code and Email Look-up in 1st Up
Direct link to program login in 1stUp
Thai language support
General bug fixes and improvements
comments: Awesome experience and valuable app!
Not finding community
What a great idea to be able to see co-workers around the world ♥️
Exciting!
The best!

title: SmartLine Second Phone Number
description:
Get a second phone number just for your business calls & texts.

When someone calls your second phone number it rings your phone and shows you it’s a business call so you know how to answer. When you call or text through SmartLine, your customers see it as coming from your new business phone number so your personal number stays private.

Try SmartLine free for 7 days with no long-term contract or extra equipment needed.  After your free trial, you’ll pay $9.99/mo for a local number or $19.99/mo for a toll-free number.

Get set up with your business phone number in under 5 minutes.

Get set up in under 5 minutes and try SmartLine free for 7 days!

More Features

Professional Quality.  Calls use your cellular connection – NOT VOIP – to give you the call clarity and reliability you need to sound professional.

Spam Call Filtering.  Answer calls with confidence because suspected spam calls are sent straight to voicemail.

Custom Voicemail.  Record a custom voicemail greeting to prompt callers to leave a message.

Voicemail to Text.  Get your business voicemail automatically transcribed to text to save you time.

Set Business Hours.  Choose when you’re available for business calls and send callers to voicemail after hours.

Stay Organized.  See your conversation history of calls, texts, pictures, and voicemail, organized by contact.

Stay Notified.  Be notified and follow up quickly whenever you have missed calls, voicemail messages, or texts.

Number Porting.  Transfer an existing 2nd phone number to use with SmartLine.

Terms

Currently available in the US only. Requires a SmartLine subscription. Install the app to choose your second phone number and claim your 7 day free trial (limit one per subscriber). After your free trial, SmartLine will automatically renew via Google Play, unless you cancel 24 hours before the free trial ends or before the end of the current billing period. Easily manage and cancel your SmartLine 2nd phone number at any time through your Google Play subscription settings. If you didn't purchase SmartLine through Google Play, you can manage your subscription through the GoDaddy website.

recentChanges:
- Some under-the-hood improvement to keep the app running smoothly.

Our team is brewing up code all day, everyday, to bring you frequent updates and improvements. Wanna send us some love? Rate us! Got a question or need help? Send us an email at SmartLineAndroid@godaddy.com :)
comments: This app has been great!!! It has become exactly what I needed, (2 phone#'s-1device) and it works better than par. It has only stopped once. However, I wrongly presumed, that I would be creating a new contacts list within the app for my business customer's and contacts. Instead, my personal contact list was imported to the app. This was a major drawback, and a disappointment. .....I'm sure I'll find the right app for the job tho.

Works Fine. I needed a second line for work but didn't want to bother with two phones. Google Fi and Google Voice don't play nice together on Google Pixel, so I went with this. It's a little more than is want to pay for how often I use it. Plus the interface is VERY basic. But, it does the job I want and I don't want to bother with switching right now.

Horrible app, stay far away. Phone accidentally deleted the app, and guess what, all my business calls and text messages got deleted too! Had many important business deals in there. Tech support (which takes forever to get ahold of) said I cannot retrieve the texts or old number, once app is deleted. Ontop of that, it never sends text messages reliably.Always appears to send, then says 15 mins later not sent.Very unprofessional and bad for business.Constant headaches and problems with this app.

Works pretty well most of the time. Sometimes it completely logs me out. Often, a text message will show up on my list of text messages (previews), but when I click on that preview to read it, it's not in the conversation. Eventually it shows up, but usually it's way too late.

This is the worst app ever I would never get it messages fail to send company tells you to on install and re install the app I've done it 17 times it signs itself out it says session has ended and you have to sign back in with all your information. Today was my last time I am uninstalling. No joy wt GoDaddy App very disappointed that I paid for it I would not recommend it or use it ever again.They responded, said I had a bad wifi/cell signal after the above.Sent pics i had 5 bars = great signal

title: Indeed Job Inbox beta
description:
Indeed Job Inbox beta is a brand-new experience from the world’s #1 job site* that delivers the latest jobs directly to you as they're posted. Manage your job search with ease and discover your dream job.

Stay up to date
- Automatically receive the latest jobs matching your preferences
- Get notifications when new jobs arrive (optional)

Stay organized
- Save your favorite jobs and apply whenever you're ready
- Delete jobs that you’re not interested in
- Use labels to organize your jobs into categories

Bugs? Suggestions? We’re listening! Send us your feedback at job-inbox-fb@indeed.com.

FAQ
- I'm not getting any notifications! Battery-saving features on your phone may prevent Job Inbox from displaying notifications. Check the battery optimization or power saver section of your phone settings and make sure Job Inbox is allowed to run in the background. Instructions for many phone brands can be found at https://dontkillmyapp.com.
- Where can I view messages from employers? Please check the email address associated with your Indeed account or visit Indeed Messages at https://messages.indeed.com.

By downloading this app, you agree to Indeed's Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service found at https://www.indeed.com/legal, where you may avail of your rights at any time, including the right to object to the legitimate interest use of your personal data for marketing purposes. In order to provide you with certain services and support ad attribution, user data, such as your IP address or other unique identifier and event data related to the installation of the Indeed App, may be shared with certain service providers when you download or install this app.

This is performed for the legitimate interest of allowing Indeed to understand and optimize our users' complete customer journey by:
- helping us understand how users arrive to Indeed
- better measure the performance of our ads;
- facilitating user logins through third party accounts in certain cases; and
- helping us understand where a user accesses Indeed through different devices
*comScore, Total Visits March 2018

Do Not Sell My Personal Information:
https://www.indeed.com/legal/ccpa-dns

You can now get jobs for up to 5 searches at a time! Visit "Settings" > "My searches" to add more searches or edit an existing search.

Keep sending us your feedback at job-inbox-fb@indeed.com!
comments: This feels similar to when I check for Indeed email notifications. I go down the list, see which ones I'm interested in applying to, or press apply later or apply now. Not much of a difference. Not saying it isn't good, just that it feels similar.
It won't open. Says internal error
I dont get the point of this app and its disapointing
5Stars***** Indeed Job Inbox Beta Installed Download Free
Brian John yoa com yes

title: Box
description:
Winner of PC Magazine's Editors' Choice Award: "There are plenty of excellent file-syncing storage services, but, on Android, the Box app takes the cake."

Securely store, manage and share all your files, photos and documents with 10GB of free cloud storage from Box.

With Box, you can easily:
* Access and work on all your files at your fingertips
* Access your content online, from your desktop, and on your Android phone or tablet
* Share important documents, contracts, visuals and more 
* Preview 200+ file types with full screen quality
* Give feedback from anywhere by commenting and mentioning colleagues and partners 

Box for Android features:
* 10GB of free cloud storage to back up all your docs
* Upload PDFs, Microsoft Office files, photos, videos and other files to Box 
* View and print 200+ file types, including PDF, Word, Excel, AI, and PSD
* File-level security controls
* Offline access to files and folders
* Share huge files with just a link - no need for attachments
* Add comments to documents to send feedback
* Real-time search
* Search within PDF, PowerPoint, Excel, Word files
* Updates feed to find recently viewed or edited files
* Open files in hundreds of partner apps that let you annotate, e-sign, edit and more

Box helps you get work done on the go. It's fast, secure and simple to use, so you can be productive from anywhere, which is the reason 57,000 businesses, including Eli Lilly and Company, General Electric, KKR & Co., P&G and The GAP securely access and manage their critical information with Box.

recentChanges: ・Additional bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: This app is horrible! There are so many things wrong with this. Thumbnai view should be a fixed selection. Shouldn't have to keep clicking a file, & then click thumbnail view every time to view photos. Cant multi-select in thumbnail view. Keeps jumping back to the first file in the folder, causing you to lose your place, & start all over again. It's non-functional all the way around, & extremely annoying. Have to keep selecting what folder to download to... ridiculous! Constantly crashing.

Unable to create an account. It just clears out the boxes when I click sign up after typing in my email and password. I tried the hitting the log in box instead with the same info and it just takes me back to the main screen. Can't really use it if I can't even get signed up...

Cant create Open XML documents without installing Microsoft apps. Im using Google Docs to edit them and make them, but I have to have office installed because Box is dumb. Also, how do we create a Google doc?? Old: No heic support. No android share support. Open in is broken. bad iPhone port. Offline inaccessible to other apps.

OK, but uploading through the app is patchy at best - if a break in service the uploads pause. If unpaise then *all* uploads (including files previously uploaded) restart ... or I can't get any / all queued files to restart uploading. Too hit and miss - mostly miss - to make this even an acceptable experience.

I have been using box for more than 6 years now and found it good alternative to Google drive. Features keep enhancing and refining, still it's simple to use. Hope to see same service from BOX going forward.

title: Sell on Etsy
description:
Sell on Etsy, our app just for sellers, lets you easily manage your business on the go. Respond to customers, see your shop stats, and manage your orders. 

Sell on Etsy makes it easy to: 

--Save time with Snippets: Waiting in line at the post office? The Snippets feature lets you quickly respond to customers by saving your most frequent responses.

--Get the whole picture: Keep tabs on your views, visits, orders, favorites and sales history.

--Stay notified: “Cha-ching!” find out when someone purchases an item, sends you a new Convo or favorites your shop or items. (Customize your notifications in Settings).  

--Manage your orders: Access open and completed orders, renew items from sold orders, mark as shipped, add private notes and send shipping notifications so buyers know when items are on the way.

--Access your listings: Create, edit, renew, and publish listings directly from the app. Use your camera to upload photos and make a listing on-the-spot. Access shop sections and item variations for quick editing. Activate and deactivate items with a tap. Who knew your phone could do all that. 

You must have an Etsy shop to use this app. Get started at www.etsy.com/sell.

Sell on Etsy, our app just for sellers, lets you easily manage your business on the go. Respond to customers, see your shop stats, and manage your orders.

You must have an Etsy shop to use this app. Get started at www.etsy.com/sell.
summary: Take your Etsy shop to new places with Sell on Etsy.
recentChanges:
We update the Sell on Etsy app every two weeks to maximize performance. Our goal is to help you manage your shop more effectively.

What's new:
- Bug fixes

Loving Etsy? Share the love by giving us a review on the Play Store!

Having issues? Visit https://www.etsy.com/help/contact?ref=appstore
comments: Updated to add: stats widget stopped working for a while but seems to be back to normal. What happened to the cha-ching sale notification? That was one of the features that actually worked consistently in the app. If you only knew what that meant [to me at least]. It was like a little celebration everytime I made a sale, but now it's just a generic default notification with no option to even customize. Bummer.

The app runs smooth,but there are a few things that could be changed to make the app perfect! I've had a couple orders go out late,due to watching the time line shown in my "order status" area, so just know to keep track of your shipping times on your own, as the app may not show the right day to ship. Other then that, Sell on Etsy app is GREAT!

I use this app a lot while out and about or at work. It's a very useful and easy app to use! I'm able to respond to customers more quickly and see when I have new orders. I can even add new listings fairly easily, though I find there are things that are easier to do on my computer.

App is helpful for general order fulfillment, keeping track of your shop on the go, as well as making minor adjustments to your listings. Still could use some improvements to make it a fuller experience, but overall it's good experience.

Switching between apps whilst typing a message deletes your message and sends you back to the homepage. Prices have to be entered twice whilst making listings. The ability to copy the link to a listing in the app has disappeared. Generally good/useful but some extremely annoying flaws that hinder productivity.

title: Sideline - Get a Second Number for a Business Line
description:
SECOND PHONE NUMBERSideline gives you a 2nd phone number on your smartphone to let you divide your communications easily and without confusion.

Sideline is more than a second line for you and your business. It’s the flexible, personal communication app that gives your customers a work number they can use - not your private one. Already tens of thousands of professionals are using Sideline to help them transform how they keep in touch with their customers with a dedicated second phone number that gives out your professional caller ID - and keeps your professional second line separate from your private one.

By creating a custom business number, Sideline gives professionals like you the chance to connect with customers, build your small business, and manage all your contacts and communications quickly and easily. Basically, you get your own dedicated, personal work number without the hassle of buying a second phone.

Sideline is your second line designed for professionals - and gives you amazing features like:

AUTO-REPLYIf you miss a call on your work line, Sideline responds automatically with a custom private message.

A TEAM WORK NUMBERSplit one business number with multiple devices, so your team or department can be more responsive in answering your work line.

CUSTOM NUMBERBuild your identity with a personalized second number, such as “(555) PET-SHOP” or “(555) FLOWERS.” So you can pick a more durable work line and professional identity, and not just a burner phone number.

LOCAL AREA CODESearch area codes to find a local second phone number for your company or small business.

BUSINESS TEXTINGText-enable your business to easily connect with customers using your 2nd or work line.

ENTERPRISE DASHBOARDManage work numbers on employee devices. (Enterprise account required. See Sideline.com for details)

Because Sideline is so helpful and efficient at helping small business and professionals, we’ve got people porting their Google second number over to Sideline.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES FOR YOUR SECOND PHONE LINE

CARRIER RELIABILITYAll calls are cellular (not VoIP) to make your 2nd phone number as reliable as your 1st.

UNLIMITED CALLING ON YOUR SECOND LINECalls use your existing carrier plan, so no extra calling credits needed for your second number.

MESSAGINGTexting includes SMS and picture messaging, group messaging, and more. So you keep all the functionalities you need.

CUSTOM CALLER ID ON YOUR 2ND PHONEIt’s clear which phone number is ringing, so you can prioritize accordingly.

SEPARATE VOICEMAILRecord a professional greeting or set up multiple greetings for every situation.

VOICEMAIL TO TEXTSave time and conveniently read voicemail transcriptions as a text.

DO NOT DISTURBSend Sideline calls directly to voicemail on nights, weekends, or holidays.

NUMBER PORTINGTransfer an existing number to Sideline from another device or landline.

WEB MESSAGINGAccess your Sideline business number online and text from the desktop.

Sideline is a business number, not a burner phone! It’s a second number for professionals that brings connections, inspiration and innovation to small business owners. Keep your private and your work number separate and manage your business more effectively.

Download Sideline and create your 2nd line today!

Privacy policy & terms of use

Access your Sideline business number online and text from the desktop.

Sideline is a business number, not a burner phone! It’s a second number for professionals that brings connections, inspiration and innovation to small business owners. Keep your private and your work number separate and manage your business more effectively.

Download Sideline and create your 2nd line today!

Privacy policy & terms of use

97 South 2nd Street, Suite 210
San Jose, California 95113
recentChanges:
Better. Faster. More Reliable. That's our motto for every update. And in this release, performance updates make Sideline all of those things.

If you're enjoying the app, please leave us a rating or review. Need help? Email us at: AndroidHelp@sideline.com
comments: The app is great! Call quality and features are reliable and high quality. I love the customization options. The only thing I wish they could add for the android version of the app is the feature to change the main and message wallpaper. This feature is available on the iphone version of the app.

I'm a subscriber for ~2 years. My experience was positive to start and has continued to get worse. Unfortunately, I don't recommend. Phone calls have delayed audio despite strong connection. I've communicated issues and they've persisted. Will update if that changes with this review.

Good App..yet frustrating..helps out alot...but wheres the feature to delete more than 1 message...it either deletes 1 text message or them all...and also the quality of sending and receiving video and photo content are horrible...also why is there a whole other number showing up on my phone when someone calls me...i never know who is calling me
Frustrating. Everything was great until today. I keep getting messages that say to keep your device mobile private open sideline app and call again. IM IN SIDELINE APP. I've reinstalled 3 times now

I Have had Sideline for almost a year with no issues. I use this number for business, so it is critical. Because of a technical problem, my calls were suddenly going directly to my other numbers voicemail without ringing. I then had need to call customer service to get help. Let me tell you, it was an extraordinary experience. I was very impressed. Such real, personable, professional service ! In the end, Dominic had the whole thing corrected in less than an hour. Stellar performance !

title: Paychex Flex
description:
The Paychex Flex app can be used by previously registered Paychex Online subscribers who log in at https://paychexonline.com. 

If you're having trouble logging in, please reach us at 888-246-7500, or make sure you are registered at https://paychexonline.com from your desktop browser. 

Now for the fun stuff! Paychex Flex keeps employers and employees connected to the most vital payroll and benefits features. 

Available features will vary and are dependent upon your company's plan options. 

EMPLOYERS 

Submit payroll 
- Enter, review, and submit on the go. 
- Resume payrolls started on your tablet or desktop.

- Employee check stubs and tax documents.

- Retirement plan balances, participation rates, and employee eligibility.

EMPLOYEES

comments: This app is atrocious. It's like every section was programmed by a different person with no communication between them. The time entry system is so different it doesn't even look like the same app. And once you enter that section, you have to choose the app and login again to b free able to access pay and messages, etc. I only continue to use it because I don't really have a choice with my company.

Overall it is a pretty good app. I enjoy being able to check my hours during the week. It's nice to have all your check stubs right there at your finger tips anytime if you need to look back. I have had some issues with things not loading or loading very slow. I know this could be my phone or where I am but it has happened in locations where other times it's worked. When it didnt load it I got an error message a reason this hasn't happened lately so an update may have fixed it.
So nice and cool. If only it would allow me the option to check my past entries. One can not always get what they want.

Can't even log in. I downloaded the app so I don't have to view my paychecks on chrome. I can't even login. I'm getting an error message, "We're sorry, but there's trouble connecting. Please try again in few minutes. [2014]" I'm on wifi, and I have a pretty new phone. There really shouldn't be an issue connecting.

The fact that they offer security passwords and dont let you use them is so annoying, I forgot my password and I can't log in without calling the office, but news flash they are close on sat and sun ... really... so over it .

title: ezTalks Free Cloud Meeting
description:
ezTalks Free Cloud Meeting is superb quality online meeting and free conference call solutions for sharing videos, documents, audio and much more. One of the best video conference app that allows its users to connect with 100 participants at once.  
 
If you are seeking for web meeting, conference call, whiteboard meeting or HD online meetings then this app is a more than blessing for you. Now send meeting invitation to your participants and bring them on business meeting within couple of seconds. Now you can host or join online meetings, share different type of content or chat with participants. Forget any other zoom app or any conference call app, install this rich features meeting app and integrate your company portal to enjoy the app functionality.   
 
Being away from office doesn’t mean you have to miss out business meetings. ezTalks Free Cloud Meeting App lets you enjoy online meetings, video conference and web meeting, no matters where are you? Meetng control function allows you to view the meeting participants and mute background noises or stop camera or logout from the meeting. Get rid of traditional zoom apps, web conference apps or whiteboard meeting apps, and use this modern online meeting software to enjoy its intiuitive features. 

ezTalks Free Cloud Meeting Funtionalities:
 
-Login through Google account of facebook account
-Host online meeting with screen sharing and video conference
-Get connected with 100 meeting attendees at once 
-High-quality video conference calls and audio calls
-Whiteboard meeting & instant messaging solutions 
-Screen rotation and screen sharing function
-Group chat and Personal chat function with specific participants
-View presenter’s  screen during online meeting
-Easy to use meeting invitation function
-Every session allows upto 25 videos

-Add or remove meeting attendees anytime
-High class meeting control room management system
-Cross communication facility with web, windows, mac and android users
-Join an online meeting via ezTalks App, Web or telephone call whatever you want 
 
Download Free: ezTalks Free Cloud Meeting and enjoy blockbuster features set of free conference call, web meeting and online meeting any where any time.

comments: My experience with this software has been completely unsatisfactory. I should rightly be given a refund. It did not work properly. It crashed, or froze my computer. When I tried to get others to use it as participants in my meetings, it was unsatisfactory for them too. I feel that I was misled by the description of the product on the ezTalks website. Specifically, it does not seem to be supported or provisioned to work satisfactorily within or from lreland. It seems incapable of supporting a meeting with even a very modest number of participants.

This is the worst app.. i downloaded it on my computer and my computer completely crashed down after i got a message from my antivirus to block it.. which i didn't.. andwithin 2 seconds .. computer crashed.. now my computer has been given for repairing.. hope it gets repaired soon..
Nice App. Almost all the features what I expect is there in this app. And voice call conferencing, chat, whiteboard and screen sharing. Basic level but very nice in this class
Had acquired some invaluable knowledge about the eztalk apps. But unfortunately cannot see navigator clearly and sound /voice a bit noisy ( the background). Good job. Keep it up.

I was notified that this app used my camera for 28 minutes when I never even opened the app. I don't even remember installing this app, but must have at some point. Using the camera without the app running?!? Deleted the app right away.

title: join.me - Simple Meetings
description:
Stay connected everywhere with join.me! join.me includes audio and video conferencing by phone or internet (VoIP) so you can see and hear anything in real time… on your time. Share your screen with participants while using audio and video at the same time. You can zoom in and see the details of every discussion - even on your phone. Whether at home, at the airport, in the coffee shop – everyone can join in the conversation with join.me.

START
Host meetings with a single tap! join.me lets you host audio calls, video calls, and share your screen* and any of your apps. Just one tap starts a scheduled meeting, a spontaneous meeting, or a conference call.

JOIN
Join a meeting, call, or video conference instantly from anywhere. Just type in the meeting code and you’re on the same page, even if you’re hundreds of miles away. 

COLLABORATE
When you’re ready to share your screen*, start your meeting and tap the screenshare button! Now your attendees can see the screen of your Android phone or tablet. Open Docs, Sheets, Slides, websites, or whatever! Attendees can follow and see everything you do. Want to share the spotlight? Pass the presenter role off to another attendee from your phone or tablet.

SAVE 
Unlimited conference calling. Whether presenting during a meeting or just using join.me audio, there are never any limits or hidden charges. With join.me PRO, take your calls to the next level with a dedicated conference line and local dial in numbers in the US and more than 45 countries.**

OTHER FEATURES INCLUDE:
• In-meeting chat with all participants at once or individually
• Talk to attendees using VoIP
• Zoom in and out of the shared screen
• See who’s attending
• Meeting lock for extra security
• Schedule meetings right from the app


EVEN MORE WITH PRO
• Create your own personal link (join.me/yourname)
• Video conferencing for up to 10 participants
• Set your personal, branded background image
• Swap presenters during meetings
• Includes full access to join.me desktop version too


* Screen sharing is supported on Android 5.0 and higher.
** Roaming, data and other applicable operator or carrier charges/fees may apply.

REQUIREMENTS:
Optimized for Android 4.4 and higher.

title: Kronos Workforce Ready Mobile
description:
Company Shortname Required! This app requires a company shortname, which is a unique company identifier which you can get from your company administrator.    

Tada! The new Workforce Ready mobile app is here! Before you jump in and download it be sure to take a look at the following.
 
*IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR NEW USERS*
BEFORE YOU LOGIN - employees and managers:
•	If your administrator has not setup the new app for your organization, you will NOT be able to access the app. Please check with your manager or company admin to get access to the new app. 
•	When logging in you will need to select the region you are using Workforce Ready as well as the Company Shortname (The unique Identification number your company administrator needs to provide to you.)
•	After you enter that information you will be prompted to enter in your Company, Username, and Password. If you get stuck on this your COMPANY ADMIN can help you out.  
•	Companies need to be using approval workflows to process To Do Items. 
•	Supported Timesheet Profiles are Bulk Hours and Start/End (All Days) only.
•	Administrator should provide their company’s Short Name to users for login.
 
Now that you are ready to join Workforce Ready here are some of the awesome things you can do within the app to enhance your human resource needs:
• Check and/or edit your timesheets for accuracy
• Submit and view time off requests
• Check vacation/sick balances
• Enroll in benefits and view existing benefits
• Check your schedule
• View pay stubs
This app is available for both employees and managers. Your employer must have Kronos Workforce Ready software configured for mobile use. 


Key things to know as an administrator: 
Users need to have permission to access the new app via their security profile. Click here to learn how to enable this for your employees: https://community.kronos.com/s/article/How-to-enable-and-configure-the-new-mobile-app. Note, you must be logged into the Kronos Community to view this article

The important: Credentials incorrect - specifically email address (based on the error bubble), which I know is correct. If they're looking for something special, it should be provided in help text.

finicky. Getting better after updates but still a pain sometimes. I have to use it a lot to punch in and out of work accounts. doesn't record punches sometimes, location data ia sometimes off,sucks the battery, app is always timing out making me sign back in or close/reopen the app. I'd rather it just automatically close when I press the home buttom. title: Google My Business - Connect with your Customers
description:
Every day, millions of people search on Google for businesses like yours. Make your Business Profile stand out and turn those searches into your customers with the Google My Business app.
• Respond to reviews, message with your customers, and see your followers in the Customers tab.
• Make edits to your Business Profile and see those changes on Google in real time.
• Upload photos, create enticing offers, and share what makes your business unique.
• See in one glance how and how much your customers interact with your Business Profile right from the app's Home tab.
• Get real-time notifications to know when a customer connects with your business on Google. Focus on what you love and rest easy knowing that Google My Business is on the clock helping you get more customers.
• Manage multiple locations from one dashboard, and invite others to manage your listing.

 Permission Notice
• Location: Needed to use your current location as your business location
• Contacts: Needed to auto-complete email addresses when inviting others to manage your listing and to make Bookings for Customers stored in your device contacts
• Storage: Needed to access photos taken at your business location

comments: This app is appalling! It used to work great and as I use this on a daily basis to get new work on through google i am furious today as for some reason its lost all of my customers messages which i had yet booked in and now have no way of contacting them!!! You can't change the quote page to add customers phone numbers etc and when you change your device which i did last month you loose all of the messages between you and the customer which effects our business massively. I need someone to contact me urgently to tell me how i get those messages back as i may of lost a days work!! I was in the middle of booking a customer just and now they will assume I do not want their business as i can't contact them. The app used to forward their email address and phone number why did this change? We use google business daily to add posts for clients to see and book customers and honestly this is a joke.

Every day I get messages that my business info is updated. I am not making changes. I've talked to customer service but they won't fix the problem. Mostly because they say there is no problem. So, either they're letting someone spam my account or it's just terminally broken and costing me business.

So, there's like no way to access messages... seriously inconvienct. However I am getting calls for my business which is the goal, I'm sure not as many as I could be but it's a good start, but when I click on messages it keeps telling me to install the app, like, yo, I am on the app! How you gonna tell me to get the app when this IS the app.... terrible. Google, you supposed to be like all powerful.... fix this!!

Useful but painful. Has no integration between multiple locations of the same business. Each common problem has to be dealt with separately for each location. Has no option to categorize photos based on events or pin posts or inform customers of other locations. It's very useful to have this app, but everything is just far more trouble than it should be. Equilibrium Fitness

This is my second review of this app. I have never been this frustrated with an app. If it worked it would be perfect but this app does not work. I never get notifications. Clients message me and it takes days to update me. It seems to experience challenges connecting to the internet. The worst part is that there Isn't an alternative. I wouldn't think twice of switching.

title: Informed Delivery®
description:
The Informed Delivery® application allows you to interact with your incoming mail and packages in one convenient location. Digitally preview your household’s letter-sized mailpieces and receive USPS Tracking® updates for incoming packages directly from the app:

•	Verify your identity to ensure you have access to your secure dashboard

•	Digitally preview grayscale images of the exterior, address side of their household’s letter-sized mailpieces scheduled to arrive soon.

•	Report missing mailpieces, and in some cases, interact with mailer-provided digital content associated with mailpiece images (e.g., special offers, related links).

•	Schedule emails and/or text-based alerts to track the delivery status of your incoming packages.

•	Scan the barcode on shipping labels with a mobile device’s camera to store the label number and track its status.

•	Leave delivery instructions for incoming packages and schedule a redelivery.
descriptionHTML:
The Informed Delivery® application allows you to interact with your incoming mail and packages in one convenient location. Digitally preview your household’s letter-sized mailpieces and receive USPS Tracking® updates for incoming packages directly from the app:

• Verify your identity to ensure you have access to your secure dashboard

• Digitally preview grayscale images of the exterior, address side of their household’s letter-sized mailpieces scheduled to arrive soon.

• Report missing mailpieces, and in some cases, interact with mailer-provided digital content associated with mailpiece images (e.g., special offers, related links).

• Schedule emails and/or text-based alerts to track the delivery status of your incoming packages.

• Scan the barcode on shipping labels with a mobile device’s camera to store the label number and track its status.

• Leave delivery instructions for incoming packages and schedule a redelivery.
summary: Access Informed Delivery® tools to track & scan packages on the go.
recentChanges: Maintenance and bug fixes including:  an issue where customers were unable to sign in and stability enhancements
comments: It randomly logged me out last week and I haven't been able to log back in since. I can log in fine on my browser, but when I try to log into the app it says "unable to complete the request" Edit: I saw in another review that someone said they were able to get back in once they cleared the cashe/data of that app. I tried that and finally got past the first message, but after I enter the code that was sent to me the screen just sits on the login screen, loading.

It was great when it still worked. I could see 90% of my parcels and envelope mail in a couple taps. However the app has quit working for me since last week and I am sad. The site still lets me log in as normal but it's a pain in the butt to have to pull it up every time and log in. Please fix your app!

It's pretty helpful. The bulk mail, like marketing mailers, doesn't always get scanned, but I don't care about that. It's come in helpful a couple of times to check to see if something important I'm expecting has arrived. Suggested improvements: Pinch zoom for mail images would be helpful

I love this app because I love being able to see when something is coming but lately I have been having problems and been receiving an error message everytime I try to sign in. Telling me the request can't be completed. However i can sign in to informed delivery on the usps website. I will change my review once you fix the issue.

It said my name/address was already registered, got past the sms verification but it said password was wrong twice then my account was blocked. Post office will not help with the app. I need this to work so I can remove my mailbox and be present to get my mail in my hand instead, or if I'm not there by the non-existent mailbox then I want mail returned. But now, u have to return every mail! Even the census.

title: Amazon Chime
description:
Amazon Chime is a new communications service that transforms meetings with a secure, easy-to-use application that you can trust. With Amazon Chime, you can conduct online meetings, call, chat, and share content easily, both inside and outside your organization. Amazon Chime is available on any device, and your meetings and conversations are always synchronized so that you can stay connected. 


Key Features:
•	Tap to join meetings – no more lengthy pin numbers
•	Easily control meetings with the visual roster
•	Tap to share content, view on any device
•	Chat and chat rooms, with attachments

Amazon Chime frees you to work wherever you need to with a single app for all your communications needs. Learn more at https://chime.aws.

Seattle, WA 98109
recentChanges:
• Users now have a setting to control whether or not they are prompted to provide feedback at the end of each meeting. The setting is per device, and can be accessed from the Chime client’s meeting settings or preferences section.
• Other bug fixes and performance enhancements
comments: Not very reliable. Disconnects when my phone screen is off. So they don't get forwarded to my Samsung gear. Doesn't notify me of chimes reliably or well. I've made sure my galaxy note9 is not shutting it down for power save mode and all permissions are on. Needs avatar photos. And for God sake FIX the contact SEARCH ENGINE SO WHEN I WANTE TO SEARCH MY CONTACTS IT QUITS TRYING TO SEARCH THE WHOLE Dam directory.

Even with proper network, where other apps are performing well, its constantly "connecting". I end up force stopping the app. Now the messages thet were in "sending" state, are all gone and I have to retype them. Very bad experience. I am not rating 1 because it gets a lot of stuff done for me and not 3 as it may not get your attention 😁.

Apple AirPod Pro minimum volume is deafeningly loud both in app, browser extension and website. Not possible to hide attendee/chat list. Not possible to receive a text copy of all attendees and chat when meeting ends. Contacts not suported by NAME SURNAME, not listed alphabetically. Very clunky to use compared to Slack, WhatsApp. Not possible to create custom groups in Favourites. No simultanous use: audio via phone and screen sharing via laptop/Macbook. No automatic calling of all participants.

I am unable to get notifications on mobile app... It's like every time I go and open my app and check my messages. Kindly look after it. Above issue is happening even after giving every permission to the app.
Ok. Not great. Get rid of the WebViews. Introduce search for chats. Make notifications expandable so you can see more of long or multiple messages.

title: SafeNet MobilePASS+
description:
SafeNet MobilePASS+ is a next generation software token that offers secure one-time passcode generation on mobile devices, as well as single-tap push authentication for enhanced user convenience.

Integrating out-of-the-box with leading cloud apps, security gateways and VPNs, SafeNet MobilePASS+ features set-and-forget lifecycle administration, making it ideal for extending secure access to consultants, partners and a dispersed workforce.


For users, SafeNet MobilePASS+ offers a frictionless experience thanks to easy QR code activation, optional biometric PIN and a choice of standard OTP and push authentication modes. In push mode, whenever a protected resource is accessed, a push notification is automatically sent to the user’s device.The user taps the MobilePASS+ notification, taps to approve the login request and is then logged in to the resource. If a PIN policy has been defined, the user then enters their alphanumeric PIN or taps Nexus Imprint to enter their biometric PIN (optional).

As of MobilePASS+ v1.6, you can now experience a seamless authentication process to access your tokens and passcodes with a fully renovated user interface.

 Notes on Permissions

SafeNet MobilePASS+ requires access to the unique identifier of your device to secure your tokens against misuse and manipulation, it will therefore request phone identity permission. SafeNet MobilePASS+ does not contain any instruction to access your phone history or phone calls.


SafeNet MobilePASS+ requires access to the camera only if enrollment via QR Code is enabled.

recentChanges:
- FIPS 140-2 compliant OTP generation
- Improved user experience
- Bug fixes
comments: I absolutely hate having to have this app. Just to be able to see or edit my info. It was a long tedious process to get it had to submit a request for a token and jump a bunch of hoops and hurdles just to be able to change my address because i had moved and got a new phone. A process that should've taken less than a minute. Took a couple of days. Not a fan. Id delete this app if my job didnt require me to have it. I hate it so so very much and theres not enough room here to properly express it.

Pretty simple and straightforward. I just wish it was better at automatically providing the code, so that using this was more like using the old tokens, rather than always having to push a button to get a new code. Once the app is launched it should just keep providing codes until you close it.

Very nice, simple and direct in its operations. Works flawlessly. Only gripe is that the ball depicting timeouts could be closer to the passcode. A few times I've been typing the numbers only to find they changed meanwhile.
Very reliable and accurate, but I have suggestion to provide an option to extend time manually, so we dont have to wait in the end renew code.

Client I work with requires the use of this application now for their remote system entry, thought it would be a hassle but it is very user friendly and quick. To my surprise its much easier than previous methods that were required. A+

title: QuickBooks Online Accounting, Invoicing & Expenses
description:
Track miles, manage invoices, maintain your financial reports and cash flow, and see your profit and loss. Run your small business on the go with the QuickBooks Online Accounting app, trusted by over 4.3 million small businesses worldwide. 

You don’t need to be a tax accountant to keep your small business bookkeeping organized. Create, send, and track invoices from viewed to paid. Access accounting solutions to know where your money is going. Plus, see where your business stands with financial reports. Small business accounting is easy with QuickBooks cloud accounting software. Our bookkeeping services make it effortless to stay on top of your business on the go. The Quickbooks Accounting app is here to make the life of every small business owner easier.

Tracking mileage automatically

Automatically track your business mileage using your phone’s GPS, without draining your phone’s battery.

Swipe to mark trips as business or personal to maximize your mileage tax deductions.

Dashboard business insights

Check your profit and loss to know what you’re making and spending, plus view your account balances.

Easily track your expenses by category so you know exactly where your money goes.

See your open and overdue invoices at a glance for easy cash flow analysis.

Create invoices and get paid faster

The invoice generator lets you send and manage invoices in multiple currencies so you always know who owes you and who paid you.

Get paid faster by credit card or bank transfer (requires a QuickBooks Payments account).

Manage payments, track sales and customers on the go

Get maximum tax savings by scanning receipts and attaching them to your expenses.  

Stay up to date on your profit and loss by connecting your bank accounts. Track finances and manage payments quickly and with ease.

Review your bank transactions and add them to your accounting records with a tap.
Easily add your customers so you can keep in touch with them on the go.

Do even more with online accounting

Customize your invoices and sales receipts with your logo, colors, and custom fields in minutes. 

Be prepared for tax time and get all the tax deductions you deserve by giving your tax accountant access to your QuickBooks data.

Add more tools with over 80 partner apps, including inventory management and advanced CRM, by going to apps.intuit.com

It’s easy to get started

Already using QuickBooks Online? Download the world’s #1 accounting app, sign in with your QuickBooks user ID and password, and enjoy the QuickBooks Accounting app for free!

New to QuickBooks Online? Download the app, create an account, and try QuickBooks free for 30 days! There’s no credit card required and no obligation to purchase.

Your free trial includes unlimited access to QuickBooks on the web and all your mobile devices. 

Not compatible with QuickBooks Desktop for Windows or Mac.

#1 Accounting Software for Small to Midsize Businesses
*Based on PCMag, as of November 2019

From INTUIT

Makers of QuickBooks Online, GoPayment, QuickBooks Payroll, TurboTax, and Mint.com

Visit:
https://security.intuit.com/privacy to learn how Intuit protects your privacy.
https://qbo.intuit.com/c1/Terms_Of_Service.html to read the Intuit terms of service.

Download today and start managing your small business easily on the go.

recentChanges: Thanks for using QuickBooks. We update our app regularly to improve performance, fix bugs and add new features so that you'll always know where your business stands.
comments: Whatever you do do NOT sign up or create a subscription through the app or the Google Play Store - you have no ability to manage your subscription or upgrade your account through the app and quickbooks customer support is unable to help or change settings as well. I am very competent with navigating apps and I can say with 100% confidence this is on the app developers at this point - extremely frustrated and unhappy with the app

It's amazing how far behind the times this company is. The only way my bank will allow me to link to Quick Books is by using my routing and account number, but QB doesn't know how to do it that way. This is crazy! So I need to switch banks just so I can link my expenses with QB. What a pain in the ass.

6.10.19 - i hate it. you can't do "billable" expenses from the app. you cant edit invoices that have been sent. terrible. i hate it. 8.12.19 - still hate it. noone has "investigated"my situation. 👎👎 12.5.19. yup.. still hate it. I use it but cringe every single time I open it. POS app. 1.3.20 still hate it no "billable button". Zero stars 3.5.20. still hate it. Zero stars

Tried to open an account, somehow ended up opening 2 separate ones. Cancelled my subscription but has still charged for the 2 accounts for over 2 months. Absolute shambles. I tried to use the one account that I actually wanted but had absolutely terrible service off the helpline, nobody knew what to do. Shocking.
paying $20 a month for an app that keeps crashing that rely on for our business is nerve wrecking. please fix asap. Have tried app from two different computers to make sure it wasn't from my end.

comments: Works great! Broke my old phone that was using and I was having issues with my new phone/new number so I emailed the developer and he gave me a number to call to have my 2 step verification reset, I called and they cleared the information from my old phone/old number and I updated my information in the 2 step verification and it was so easy after that....this is the best app for a CSM to check the store schedule on a daily basis.....

Absolutely God Awful. I can't even log in. For a multi million dollar company, you'd think they'd actually let their employees look at their schedules, but no. None of the schedule apps work. They all ask for a push notification or some kind of code from an app they don't even give the name to. If you press the push notification, it literally does nothing and you're left sitting there wanting to throw your phone against the wall. This is garbage. And knowing Walmart, it's not going to improve.

My last review was 11/18/19.. I thought heck it's been 3 months let's see if they fixed anything. NOPE App still crashes upon Authentication. From the looks of other reviews it doesn't work on alot of Samsung phones which is ridiculous considering Samsung is one of the most dominant phone brands... There is another app to use called me@walmart but I really liked this one :(

App keeps crashing everytime I try to set up a pin other than that it is great but having to log in through the wire and get sent a text notification so I can put in a verification code every time I try to check my schedule is pretty annoying.

I have uni stalled and reinstalled several times and the app doesnt let nor give u an optuon to log in anymore....NOT HAPPY🤬THIS APP IS A PIECE OF S**T🤬If its not one thing,its another with this app!!!Now it shuts down when u try to use the PIN login n set it🤬🤬🤬People...come on...its not that hard to fix🤬🤬🤬DO NOT INSTALL!!!

title: Yammer
description:
The Yammer mobile app helps you stay connected from anywhere - driving employee engagement and participation across the entire company like nothing else can.

Yammer helps you connect with leaders and peers, share and discover knowledge and engage in org-wide communities that matter to you.

Yammer for Android keeps you informed and in touch while on the go to:

Engage with Leadership:
Yammer app enables leaders and employees to engage and co-create company culture.

You can watch and participate in Live Events, Townhalls, All-hands videos and to stay aligned with what’s top of mind for leadership.

Share Knowledge
Ask questions, share knowledge and feedback, crowdsource ideas using org-wide communities

Build community
Discover and participate in org-wide communities to connect with colleagues with similar interests and skillsets

Stay connected
with Yammer for Android you\'re just a tap away from leadership, coworkers, information and conversations whether you are in office or on the go.

Rich intuitive mobile experience
Yammer enables you to engage on mobile in a way that is intuitive on Android. Share photos and videos with your colleagues, respond with a quick GIF to welcome a new employee or praise someone.

Get interactive notifications that are tuned to the right amount of information you need. Access these notifications from your lock screen.

Get access to early versions of Yammer! Join the Yammer Beta program by visiting:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.yammer.v1/

By downloading this app, you agree to the License Terms and Privacy Statement
